duas.textAr: أَصْبَحْنَا وَأَصْبَحَ الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ، وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ، لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
duas.textEn: We have reached the morning and at this very time the whole kingdom belongs to Allah. All praise is due to Allah. None has the right to be worshipped except Allah alone, without any partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He is over all things Omnipotent.

translations.ar: We have reached the morning and at this very time the whole kingdom belongs to Allah. All praise is due to Allah. None has the right to be worshipped except Allah alone, without any partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He is over all things Omnipotent.
translations.en: We have reached the morning and at this very time the whole kingdom belongs to Allah. All praise is due to Allah. None has the right to be worshipped except Allah alone, without any partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He is over all things Omnipotent.

duas.transliterationEn: Asbahna wa asbahal-mulku lillah, walhamdu lillah, la ilaha illallahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadeer

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ بِكَ أَصْبَحْنَا، وَبِكَ أَمْسَيْنَا، وَبِكَ نَحْيَا، وَبِكَ نَمُوتُ، وَإِلَيْكَ النُّشُورُ
duas.textEn: O Allah, by You we enter the morning and by You we enter the evening, by You we live and by You we die, and to You is the resurrection.

translations.ar: O Allah, by You we enter the morning and by You we enter the evening, by You we live and by You we die, and to You is the resurrection.
translations.en: O Allah, by You we enter the morning and by You we enter the evening, by You we live and by You we die, and to You is the resurrection.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma bika asbahna, wa bika amsayna, wa bika nahya, wa bika namootu, wa ilaykan-nushoor

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، خَلَقْتَنِي وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ، وَأَنَا عَلَى عَهْدِكَ وَوَعْدِكَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُ، أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا صَنَعْتُ، أَبُوءُ لَكَ بِنِعْمَتِكَ عَلَيَّ، وَأَبُوءُ لَكَ بِذَنْبِي فَاغْفِرْ لِي، فَإِنَّهُ لَا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is no deity except You. You created me and I am Your servant. I am upon Your covenant and promise as much as I am able. I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done. I acknowledge Your favor upon me, and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for there is none who forgives sins except You.

translations.ar: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is no deity except You. You created me and I am Your servant. I am upon Your covenant and promise as much as I am able. I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done. I acknowledge Your favor upon me, and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for there is none who forgives sins except You.
translations.en: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is no deity except You. You created me and I am Your servant. I am upon Your covenant and promise as much as I am able. I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done. I acknowledge Your favor upon me, and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for there is none who forgives sins except You.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma anta rabbi la ilaha illa ant, khalaqtani wa ana 'abduk, wa ana 'ala 'ahdika wa wa'dika mastata't, a'udhu bika min sharri ma sana't, abu'u laka bini'matika 'alayy, wa abu'u bidhanbi faghfir li, fa innahu la yaghfirudh-dhunuba illa ant

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ عَالِمَ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ، فَاطِرَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ، رَبَّ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَمَلِيكَهُ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ نَفْسِي، وَمِنْ شَرِّ الشَّيْطَانِ وَشِرْكِهِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things. I bear witness that there is no deity except You. I seek refuge in You from the evil of my soul, and from the evil of Satan and his polytheism.

translations.ar: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things. I bear witness that there is no deity except You. I seek refuge in You from the evil of my soul, and from the evil of Satan and his polytheism.
translations.en: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things. I bear witness that there is no deity except You. I seek refuge in You from the evil of my soul, and from the evil of Satan and his polytheism.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma 'alimal-ghaybi wash-shahadah, fatiris-samawati wal-ard, rabba kulli shay'in wa maleekah, ash-hadu an la ilaha illa ant, a'udhu bika min sharri nafsi, wa min sharrish-shaytani wa shirkihi

duas.textAr: أَمْسَيْنَا وَأَمْسَى الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ، وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ، لَا إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
duas.textEn: We have reached the evening and at this very time the whole kingdom belongs to Allah. All praise is due to Allah. None has the right to be worshipped except Allah alone, without any partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He is over all things Omnipotent.

translations.ar: We have reached the evening and at this very time the whole kingdom belongs to Allah. All praise is due to Allah. None has the right to be worshipped except Allah alone, without any partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He is over all things Omnipotent.
translations.en: We have reached the evening and at this very time the whole kingdom belongs to Allah. All praise is due to Allah. None has the right to be worshipped except Allah alone, without any partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He is over all things Omnipotent.

duas.transliterationEn: Amsayna wa amsal-mulku lillah, walhamdu lillah, la ilaha illallahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadeer

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ بِكَ أَمْسَيْنَا، وَبِكَ أَصْبَحْنَا، وَبِكَ نَحْيَا، وَبِكَ نَمُوتُ، وَإِلَيْكَ الْمَصِيرُ
duas.textEn: O Allah, by You we enter the evening and by You we enter the morning, by You we live and by You we die, and to You is the final return.

translations.ar: O Allah, by You we enter the evening and by You we enter the morning, by You we live and by You we die, and to You is the final return.
translations.en: O Allah, by You we enter the evening and by You we enter the morning, by You we live and by You we die, and to You is the final return.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma bika amsayna, wa bika asbahna, wa bika nahya, wa bika namootu, wa ilaykal-maseer

duas.textAr: رَضِيتُ بِاللَّهِ رَبّاً، وَبِالْإِسْلاَمِ دِيناً، وَبِمُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ نَبِيّاً
duas.textEn: I am pleased with Allah as my Lord, with Islam as my religion, and with Muhammad (peace be upon him) as my Prophet.

translations.ar: I am pleased with Allah as my Lord, with Islam as my religion, and with Muhammad (peace be upon him) as my Prophet.
translations.en: I am pleased with Allah as my Lord, with Islam as my religion, and with Muhammad (peace be upon him) as my Prophet.

duas.transliterationEn: Raditu billahi rabba, wa bil-Islami deena, wa bi-Muhammadin sallallahu 'alayhi wa sallama nabiyya

duas.textAr: أَصْبَحْنَا عَلَى فِطْرَةِ الْإِسْلَامِ، وَعَلَى كَلِمَةِ الْإِخْلَاصِ، وَعَلَى دِينِ نَبِيِّنَا مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ، وَعَلَى مِلَّةِ أَبِينَا إِبْرَاهِيمَ حَنِيفاً مُسْلِماً وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ الْمُشْرِكِينَ
duas.textEn: We have reached the morning upon the natural religion of Islam, upon the word of sincerity, upon the religion of our Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him), and upon the way of our father Ibrahim, inclining toward truth, a Muslim, and he was not of the polytheists.
duas.titleEn: Upon the Natural Religion of Islam

titleTranslations.en: Upon the Natural Religion of Islam

translations.ar: We have reached the morning upon the natural religion of Islam, upon the word of sincerity, upon the religion of our Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him), and upon the way of our father Ibrahim, inclining toward truth, a Muslim, and he was not of the polytheists.
translations.en: We have reached the morning upon the natural religion of Islam, upon the word of sincerity, upon the religion of our Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him), and upon the way of our father Ibrahim, inclining toward truth, a Muslim, and he was not of the polytheists.

duas.transliterationEn: Asbahna 'ala fitratil-Islam, wa 'ala kalimatil-ikhlas, wa 'ala deeni nabiyyina Muhammadin sallallahu 'alayhi wa sallam, wa 'ala millati abeena Ibrahima haneefan musliman wa ma kana minal-mushrikeen

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ، اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ فِي دِينِي وَدُنْيَايَ وَأَهْلِي وَمَالِي
duas.textEn: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in this world and the Hereafter. O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in my religion, my worldly life, my family, and my wealth.

translations.ar: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in this world and the Hereafter. O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in my religion, my worldly life, my family, and my wealth.
translations.en: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in this world and the Hereafter. O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in my religion, my worldly life, my family, and my wealth.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni as'alukal-'afwa wal-'afiyata fid-dunya wal-akhirah. Allahumma inni as'alukal-'afwa wal-'afiyata fi deeni wa dunyaya wa ahli wa mali

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اسْتُرْ عَوْرَاتِي وَآمِنْ رَوْعَاتِي، اللَّهُمَّ احْفَظْنِي مِنْ بَيْنِ يَدَيَّ، وَمِنْ خَلْفِي، وَعَنْ يَمِينِي، وَعَنْ شِمَالِي، وَمِنْ فَوْقِي، وَأَعُوذُ بِعَظَمَتِكَ أَنْ أُغْتَالَ مِنْ تَحْتِي
duas.textEn: O Allah, conceal my faults and calm my fears. O Allah, protect me from in front of me and from behind me, from my right and from my left, and from above me. I seek refuge in Your Greatness from being taken unawares from beneath me.

translations.ar: O Allah, conceal my faults and calm my fears. O Allah, protect me from in front of me and from behind me, from my right and from my left, and from above me. I seek refuge in Your Greatness from being taken unawares from beneath me.
translations.en: O Allah, conceal my faults and calm my fears. O Allah, protect me from in front of me and from behind me, from my right and from my left, and from above me. I seek refuge in Your Greatness from being taken unawares from beneath me.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahummas-tur 'awrati wa amin raw'ati. Allahummah-fazni min bayni yadayya, wa min khalfi, wa 'an yameeni, wa 'an shimali, wa min fawqi, wa a'udhu bi'azamatika an ughtala min tahti

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْمًا نَافِعًا، وَرِزْقًا طَيِّبًا، وَعَمَلًا مُتَقَبَّلًا
duas.textEn: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, good provision, and accepted deeds.

translations.ar: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, good provision, and accepted deeds.
translations.en: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, good provision, and accepted deeds.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni as'aluka 'ilman nafi'a, wa rizqan tayyiba, wa 'amalan mutaqabbala

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ مَا أَصْبَحَ بِي مِنْ نِعْمَةٍ فَمِنْكَ وَحْدَكَ لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ، فَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ وَلَكَ الشُّكْرُ
duas.textEn: O Allah, whatever blessing I have received this morning is from You alone, without partner. So for You is all praise and to You is all thanks.

translations.ar: O Allah, whatever blessing I have received this morning is from You alone, without partner. So for You is all praise and to You is all thanks.
translations.en: O Allah, whatever blessing I have received this morning is from You alone, without partner. So for You is all praise and to You is all thanks.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma ma asbaha bi min ni'matin faminka wahdaka la shareeka lak, falakal-hamdu wa lakash-shukr

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْبُخْلِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْجُبْنِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ أَنْ أُرَدَّ إِلَى أَرْذَلِ الْعُمُرِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ فِتْنَةِ الدُّنْيَا، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from miserliness, I seek refuge in You from cowardice, I seek refuge in You from being returned to decrepit old age, I seek refuge in You from the trials of this world, and I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from miserliness, I seek refuge in You from cowardice, I seek refuge in You from being returned to decrepit old age, I seek refuge in You from the trials of this world, and I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from miserliness, I seek refuge in You from cowardice, I seek refuge in You from being returned to decrepit old age, I seek refuge in You from the trials of this world, and I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-bukhl, wa a'udhu bika minal-jubn, wa a'udhu bika an uradda ila ardhalil-'umur, wa a'udhu bika min fitnatid-dunya, wa a'udhu bika min 'adhabil-qabr

duas.textAr: يَا حَيُّ يَا قَيُّومُ بِرَحْمَتِكَ أَسْتَغِيثُ، أَصْلِحْ لِي شَأْنِي كُلَّهُ، وَلَا تَكِلْنِي إِلَى نَفْسِي طَرْفَةَ عَيْنٍ
duas.textEn: O Ever-Living, O Sustainer, by Your mercy I seek help. Set right all my affairs and do not leave me to myself for the blink of an eye.

translations.ar: O Ever-Living, O Sustainer, by Your mercy I seek help. Set right all my affairs and do not leave me to myself for the blink of an eye.
translations.en: O Ever-Living, O Sustainer, by Your mercy I seek help. Set right all my affairs and do not leave me to myself for the blink of an eye.

duas.transliterationEn: Ya Hayyu ya Qayyum, bi rahmatika astaghith, aslih li sha'ni kullah, wa la takilni ila nafsi tarfata 'ayn

duas.textAr: أَصْبَحْنَا وَأَصْبَحَ الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ، اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ هَذَا الْيَوْمِ: فَتْحَهُ، وَنَصْرَهُ، وَنُورَهُ، وَبَرَكَتَهُ، وَهُدَاهُ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا فِيهِ وَشَرِّ مَا بَعْدَهُ
duas.textEn: We have reached the morning and the whole kingdom belongs to Allah, Lord of the worlds. O Allah, I ask You for the good of this day: its triumph, its victory, its light, its blessing, and its guidance. I seek refuge in You from the evil in it and the evil after it.

translations.ar: We have reached the morning and the whole kingdom belongs to Allah, Lord of the worlds. O Allah, I ask You for the good of this day: its triumph, its victory, its light, its blessing, and its guidance. I seek refuge in You from the evil in it and the evil after it.
translations.en: We have reached the morning and the whole kingdom belongs to Allah, Lord of the worlds. O Allah, I ask You for the good of this day: its triumph, its victory, its light, its blessing, and its guidance. I seek refuge in You from the evil in it and the evil after it.

duas.transliterationEn: Asbahna wa asbahal-mulku lillahi rabbil-'alamin. Allahumma inni as'aluka khayra hadhal-yawm: fat-hahu wa nasrahu wa nurahu wa barakatahu wa hudahu, wa a'udhu bika min sharri ma fihi wa sharri ma ba'dah

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ بِكَ أَصْبَحْنَا وَبِكَ أَمْسَيْنَا، وَبِكَ نَحْيَا وَبِكَ نَمُوتُ وَإِلَيْكَ الْمَصِيرُ
duas.textEn: O Allah, by You we enter the morning and by You we enter the evening. By You we live and by You we die, and to You is the final destination.

translations.ar: O Allah, by You we enter the morning and by You we enter the evening. By You we live and by You we die, and to You is the final destination.
translations.en: O Allah, by You we enter the morning and by You we enter the evening. By You we live and by You we die, and to You is the final destination.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma bika asbahna wa bika amsayna, wa bika nahya wa bika namut wa ilaykal-masir

duas.textAr: بِسْمِ اللهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
duas.textEn: In the name of Allah, with whose name nothing on earth or in heaven can cause harm, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

translations.ar: In the name of Allah, with whose name nothing on earth or in heaven can cause harm, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.
translations.en: In the name of Allah, with whose name nothing on earth or in heaven can cause harm, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

duas.transliterationEn: Bismillahil-ladhi la yadurru ma'asmihi shay'un fil-ardi wa la fis-sama'i wa huwas-sami'ul-'aleem

duas.textAr: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
duas.textEn: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.

translations.ar: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.
translations.en: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.

duas.transliterationEn: A'udhu bikalimatillahit-tammati min sharri ma khalaq

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْجُبْنِ وَالْبُخْلِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ غَلَبَةِ الدَّيْنِ وَقَهْرِ الرِّجَالِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from worry and grief, I seek refuge in You from incapacity and laziness, I seek refuge in You from cowardice and miserliness, and I seek refuge in You from being overcome by debt and being overpowered by men.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from worry and grief, I seek refuge in You from incapacity and laziness, I seek refuge in You from cowardice and miserliness, and I seek refuge in You from being overcome by debt and being overpowered by men.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from worry and grief, I seek refuge in You from incapacity and laziness, I seek refuge in You from cowardice and miserliness, and I seek refuge in You from being overcome by debt and being overpowered by men.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazan, wa a'udhu bika minal-'ajzi wal-kasal, wa a'udhu bika minal-jubni wal-bukhl, wa a'udhu bika min ghalabatid-dayni wa qahrir-rijal

duas.textAr: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ غَضَبِهِ وَعِقَابِهِ، وَشَرِّ عِبَادِهِ، وَمِنْ هَمَزَاتِ الشَّيَاطِينِ وَأَنْ يَحْضُرُونِ
duas.textEn: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from His wrath and punishment, from the evil of His servants, and from the whisperings of devils and their presence.

translations.ar: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from His wrath and punishment, from the evil of His servants, and from the whisperings of devils and their presence.
translations.en: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from His wrath and punishment, from the evil of His servants, and from the whisperings of devils and their presence.

duas.transliterationEn: A'udhu bikalimatillahit-tammati min ghadabihi wa 'iqabihi, wa sharri 'ibadihi, wa min hamazatish-shayateeni wa an yahdurun

duas.textAr: أُعِيذُكُمَا بِكَلِمَاتِ اللهِ التَّامَّةِ مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ وَهَامَّةٍ، وَمِنْ كُلِّ عَيْنٍ لَامَّةٍ
duas.textEn: I seek protection for you both by the perfect words of Allah from every devil and every poisonous pest, and from every evil eye.

translations.ar: I seek protection for you both by the perfect words of Allah from every devil and every poisonous pest, and from every evil eye.
translations.en: I seek protection for you both by the perfect words of Allah from every devil and every poisonous pest, and from every evil eye.

duas.transliterationEn: U'idhukuma bikalimatillahit-tammah, min kulli shaytanin wa hammah, wa min kulli 'aynin lammah

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ احْفَظْنِي مِنْ بَيْنِ يَدَيَّ، وَمِنْ خَلْفِي، وَعَنْ يَمِينِي، وَعَنْ شِمَالِي، وَمِنْ فَوْقِي، وَأَعُوذُ بِعَظَمَتِكَ أَنْ أُغْتَالَ مِنْ تَحْتِي
duas.textEn: O Allah, protect me from in front of me and from behind me, from my right and from my left, and from above me. I seek refuge in Your Greatness from being taken unawares from beneath me.

translations.ar: O Allah, protect me from in front of me and from behind me, from my right and from my left, and from above me. I seek refuge in Your Greatness from being taken unawares from beneath me.
translations.en: O Allah, protect me from in front of me and from behind me, from my right and from my left, and from above me. I seek refuge in Your Greatness from being taken unawares from beneath me.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahummah-fazni min bayni yadayya, wa min khalfi, wa 'an yameeni, wa 'an shimali, wa min fawqi, wa a'udhu bi'azamatika an ughtala min tahti

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ زَوَالِ نِعْمَتِكَ، وَتَحَوُّلِ عَافِيَتِكَ، وَفُجَاءَةِ نِقْمَتِكَ، وَجَمِيعِ سَخَطِكَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the removal of Your blessing, the decline of Your protection, Your sudden punishment, and all of Your displeasure.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the removal of Your blessing, the decline of Your protection, Your sudden punishment, and all of Your displeasure.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the removal of Your blessing, the decline of Your protection, Your sudden punishment, and all of Your displeasure.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min zawali ni'matik, wa tahawwuli 'afiyatik, wa fuja'ati niqmatik, wa jami'i sakhatik

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكَسَلِ وَالْهَرَمِ، وَالْمَغْرَمِ وَالْمَأْثَمِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from laziness and old age, from debt and sin.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from laziness and old age, from debt and sin.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from laziness and old age, from debt and sin.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-kasali wal-haram, wal-maghrami wal-ma'tham

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْبَرَصِ، وَالْجُنُونِ، وَالْجُذَامِ، وَمِنْ سَيِّئِ الْأَسْقَامِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from leprosy, madness, elephantiasis, and evil diseases.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from leprosy, madness, elephantiasis, and evil diseases.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from leprosy, madness, elephantiasis, and evil diseases.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-barasi wal-jununi wal-judhami wa min sayyi'il-asqam

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ مُنْكَرَاتِ الْأَخْلَاقِ، وَالْأَعْمَالِ، وَالْأَهْوَاءِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from evil character, evil actions, and evil desires.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from evil character, evil actions, and evil desires.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from evil character, evil actions, and evil desires.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min munkaratil-akhlaq wal-a'mal wal-ahwa'

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْفَقْرِ، وَالْقِلَّةِ، وَالذِّلَّةِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ أَنْ أَظْلِمَ أَوْ أُظْلَمَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from poverty, scarcity, and humiliation, and I seek refuge in You from oppressing or being oppressed.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from poverty, scarcity, and humiliation, and I seek refuge in You from oppressing or being oppressed.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from poverty, scarcity, and humiliation, and I seek refuge in You from oppressing or being oppressed.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-faqri wal-qillati wadh-dhillah, wa a'udhu bika min an azlima aw uzlam

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ جَهْدِ الْبَلَاءِ، وَدَرَكِ الشَّقَاءِ، وَسُوءِ الْقَضَاءِ، وَشَمَاتَةِ الْأَعْدَاءِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the severity of trials, the depths of misery, evil destiny, and the gloating of enemies.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the severity of trials, the depths of misery, evil destiny, and the gloating of enemies.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the severity of trials, the depths of misery, evil destiny, and the gloating of enemies.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min jahdil-bala', wa darakish-shaqa', wa su'il-qada', wa shamatati-l-a'da'

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ سَمْعِي، وَمِنْ شَرِّ بَصَرِي، وَمِنْ شَرِّ لِسَانِي، وَمِنْ شَرِّ قَلْبِي، وَمِنْ شَرِّ مَنِيِّي
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of my hearing, the evil of my sight, the evil of my tongue, the evil of my heart, and the evil of my desires.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of my hearing, the evil of my sight, the evil of my tongue, the evil of my heart, and the evil of my desires.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of my hearing, the evil of my sight, the evil of my tongue, the evil of my heart, and the evil of my desires.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min sharri sam'i, wa min sharri basari, wa min sharri lisani, wa min sharri qalbi, wa min sharri maniyyi

duas.textAr: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَتُبْ عَلَيَّ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ
duas.textEn: My Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance. Indeed, You are the Accepting of Repentance, the Most Merciful.

translations.ar: My Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance. Indeed, You are the Accepting of Repentance, the Most Merciful.
translations.en: My Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance. Indeed, You are the Accepting of Repentance, the Most Merciful.

duas.transliterationEn: Rabbighfir li wa tub 'alayya innaka antat-tawwabur-raheem

duas.textAr: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللهَ الَّذِي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْهِ
duas.textEn: I seek forgiveness from Allah, there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence, and I repent to Him.

translations.ar: I seek forgiveness from Allah, there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence, and I repent to Him.
translations.en: I seek forgiveness from Allah, there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence, and I repent to Him.

duas.transliterationEn: Astaghfirullaha alladhi la ilaha illa huwal-hayyul-qayyum wa atubu ilayh

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّكَ عَفُوٌّ تُحِبُّ الْعَفْوَ فَاعْفُ عَنِّي
duas.textEn: O Allah, You are Forgiving and love forgiveness, so forgive me.

translations.ar: O Allah, You are Forgiving and love forgiveness, so forgive me.
translations.en: O Allah, You are Forgiving and love forgiveness, so forgive me.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma innaka 'afuwwun tuhibbul-'afwa fa'fu 'anni

duas.textAr: رَبَّنَا ظَلَمْنَا أَنْفُسَنَا وَإِنْ لَمْ تَغْفِرْ لَنَا وَتَرْحَمْنَا لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ الْخَاسِرِينَ
duas.textEn: Our Lord, we have wronged ourselves, and if You do not forgive us and have mercy upon us, we will surely be among the losers.

translations.ar: Our Lord, we have wronged ourselves, and if You do not forgive us and have mercy upon us, we will surely be among the losers.
translations.en: Our Lord, we have wronged ourselves, and if You do not forgive us and have mercy upon us, we will surely be among the losers.

duas.transliterationEn: Rabbana zalamna anfusana wa in lam taghfir lana wa tarhamna lanakoonanna minal-khasireen

duas.textAr: رَبَّنَا اغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَإِسْرَافَنَا فِي أَمْرِنَا وَثَبِّتْ أَقْدَامَنَا وَانْصُرْنَا عَلَى الْقَوْمِ الْكَافِرِينَ
duas.textEn: Our Lord, forgive us our sins and our excesses in our affairs and plant firmly our feet and give us victory over the disbelieving people.

translations.ar: Our Lord, forgive us our sins and our excesses in our affairs and plant firmly our feet and give us victory over the disbelieving people.
translations.en: Our Lord, forgive us our sins and our excesses in our affairs and plant firmly our feet and give us victory over the disbelieving people.

duas.transliterationEn: Rabbana-ghfir lana dhunubana wa israfana fi amrina wa thabbit aqdamana wansurna 'alal-qawmil-kafireen

duas.textAr: رَبَّنَا لَا تُؤَاخِذْنَا إِنْ نَسِينَا أَوْ أَخْطَأْنَا
duas.textEn: Our Lord, do not impose blame upon us if we forget or make a mistake.

translations.ar: Our Lord, do not impose blame upon us if we forget or make a mistake.
translations.en: Our Lord, do not impose blame upon us if we forget or make a mistake.

duas.transliterationEn: Rabbana la tu'akhidhna in nasina aw akhta'na

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي خَطِيئَتِي وَجَهْلِي، وَإِسْرَافِي فِي أَمْرِي، وَمَا أَنْتَ أَعْلَمُ بِهِ مِنِّي
duas.textEn: O Allah, forgive me my sins and my ignorance, my excess in my affairs, and what You know better than I.

translations.ar: O Allah, forgive me my sins and my ignorance, my excess in my affairs, and what You know better than I.
translations.en: O Allah, forgive me my sins and my ignorance, my excess in my affairs, and what You know better than I.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahummaghfir li khati'ati wa jahli, wa israfi fi amri, wa ma anta a'lamu bihi minni

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي ذَنْبِي كُلَّهُ، دِقَّهُ وَجِلَّهُ، وَأَوَّلَهُ وَآخِرَهُ، وَعَلَانِيَتَهُ وَسِرَّهُ
duas.textEn: O Allah, forgive me all my sins, small and great, first and last, open and secret.

translations.ar: O Allah, forgive me all my sins, small and great, first and last, open and secret.
translations.en: O Allah, forgive me all my sins, small and great, first and last, open and secret.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahummaghfir li dhanbi kullahu, diqqahu wa jillahu, wa awwalahu wa akhirahu, wa 'alaniyatahu wa sirrahu

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِي ظُلْمًا كَثِيرًا، وَلَا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، فَاغْفِرْ لِي مَغْفِرَةً مِنْ عِنْدِكَ وَارْحَمْنِي، إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْغَفُورُ الرَّحِيمُ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I have wronged myself greatly, and none forgives sins except You. So grant me forgiveness from You and have mercy on me. Indeed, You are the Forgiving, the Merciful.

translations.ar: O Allah, I have wronged myself greatly, and none forgives sins except You. So grant me forgiveness from You and have mercy on me. Indeed, You are the Forgiving, the Merciful.
translations.en: O Allah, I have wronged myself greatly, and none forgives sins except You. So grant me forgiveness from You and have mercy on me. Indeed, You are the Forgiving, the Merciful.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni zalamtu nafsi zulman kathira, wa la yaghfirudh-dhunuba illa ant, faghfir li maghfiratan min 'indika warhamni, innaka antal-ghafurur-rahim

duas.textAr: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي، وَتُبْ عَلَيَّ، إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ التَّوَّابُ الْغَفُورُ
duas.textEn: My Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance. Indeed, You are the Accepting of Repentance, the Forgiving.

translations.ar: My Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance. Indeed, You are the Accepting of Repentance, the Forgiving.
translations.en: My Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance. Indeed, You are the Accepting of Repentance, the Forgiving.

duas.transliterationEn: Rabbighfir li wa tub 'alayya innaka antat-tawwabul-ghafur

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي، وَارْحَمْنِي، وَاهْدِنِي، وَارْزُقْنِي
duas.textEn: O Allah, forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, and provide for me.

translations.ar: O Allah, forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, and provide for me.
translations.en: O Allah, forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, and provide for me.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahummaghfir li, warhamni, wahdini, warzuqni

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اهْدِنِي وَسَدِّدْنِي
duas.textEn: O Allah, guide me and keep me on the right path.

translations.ar: O Allah, guide me and keep me on the right path.
translations.en: O Allah, guide me and keep me on the right path.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma-hdini wa saddidni

duas.textAr: رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي وَيَسِّرْ لِي أَمْرِي
duas.textEn: My Lord, expand for me my chest and ease for me my task.

translations.ar: My Lord, expand for me my chest and ease for me my task.
translations.en: My Lord, expand for me my chest and ease for me my task.

duas.transliterationEn: Rabbish-rahli sadri wa yassir li amri

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْهُدَى وَالتُّقَى وَالْعَفَافَ وَالْغِنَى
duas.textEn: O Allah, I ask You for guidance, piety, chastity, and self-sufficiency.

translations.ar: O Allah, I ask You for guidance, piety, chastity, and self-sufficiency.
translations.en: O Allah, I ask You for guidance, piety, chastity, and self-sufficiency.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni as'alukal-huda wat-tuqa wal-'afafa wal-ghina

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ أَلْهِمْنِي رُشْدِي، وَأَعِذْنِي مِنْ شَرِّ نَفْسِي
duas.textEn: O Allah, inspire me with my guidance, and protect me from the evil of my soul.

translations.ar: O Allah, inspire me with my guidance, and protect me from the evil of my soul.
translations.en: O Allah, inspire me with my guidance, and protect me from the evil of my soul.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma alhimni rushdi, wa a'idhni min sharri nafsi

duas.textAr: اهْدِنَا الصِّرَاطَ الْمُسْتَقِيمَ، صِرَاطَ الَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ الْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا الضَّالِّينَ
duas.textEn: Guide us to the straight path, the path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor, not of those who have evoked Your anger or of those who are astray.

translations.ar: Guide us to the straight path, the path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor, not of those who have evoked Your anger or of those who are astray.
translations.en: Guide us to the straight path, the path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor, not of those who have evoked Your anger or of those who are astray.

duas.transliterationEn: Ihdinas-siratal-mustaqeem, siratal-ladhina an'amta 'alayhim ghayril-maghdubi 'alayhim wa lad-dalleen

duas.textAr: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِنْ لَدُنْكَ رَحْمَةً إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْوَهَّابُ
duas.textEn: Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate after You have guided us and grant us from Yourself mercy. Indeed, You are the Bestower.

translations.ar: Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate after You have guided us and grant us from Yourself mercy. Indeed, You are the Bestower.
translations.en: Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate after You have guided us and grant us from Yourself mercy. Indeed, You are the Bestower.

duas.transliterationEn: Rabbana la tuzigh qulubana ba'da idh hadaytana wa hab lana min ladunka rahma, innaka antal-wahhab

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْتَخِيرُكَ بِعِلْمِكَ، وَأَسْتَقْدِرُكَ بِقُدْرَتِكَ، وَأَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ الْعَظِيمِ، فَإِنَّكَ تَقْدِرُ وَلَا أَقْدِرُ، وَتَعْلَمُ وَلَا أَعْلَمُ، وَأَنْتَ عَلَّامُ الْغُيُوبِ. اللَّهُمَّ إِنْ كُنْتَ تَعْلَمُ أَنَّ هَذَا الْأَمْرَ خَيْرٌ لِي فِي دِينِي وَمَعَاشِي وَعَاقِبَةِ أَمْرِي فَاقْدُرْهُ لِي وَيَسِّرْهُ لِي ثُمَّ بَارِكْ لِي فِيهِ. وَإِنْ كُنْتَ تَعْلَمُ أَنَّ هَذَا الْأَمْرَ شَرٌّ لِي فِي دِينِي وَمَعَاشِي وَعَاقِبَةِ أَمْرِي فَاصْرِفْهُ عَنِّي وَاصْرِفْنِي عَنْهُ وَاقْدُرْ لِيَ الْخَيْرَ حَيْثُ كَانَ ثُمَّ أَرْضِنِي بِهِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek Your guidance by Your knowledge, and I seek ability by Your power, and I ask You of Your great bounty. For You are capable whereas I am not, You know and I know not, and You are the Knower of the unseen. O Allah, if You know this matter to be good for my religion, my livelihood, and the outcome of my affairs, then decree it for me and make it easy for me, and bless me in it. And if You know this matter to be bad for my religion, my livelihood, and the outcome of my affairs, then turn it away from me and turn me away from it, and decree for me the good wherever it may be, then make me content with it.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek Your guidance by Your knowledge, and I seek ability by Your power, and I ask You of Your great bounty. For You are capable whereas I am not, You know and I know not, and You are the Knower of the unseen. O Allah, if You know this matter to be good for my religion, my livelihood, and the outcome of my affairs, then decree it for me and make it easy for me, and bless me in it. And if You know this matter to be bad for my religion, my livelihood, and the outcome of my affairs, then turn it away from me and turn me away from it, and decree for me the good wherever it may be, then make me content with it.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek Your guidance by Your knowledge, and I seek ability by Your power, and I ask You of Your great bounty. For You are capable whereas I am not, You know and I know not, and You are the Knower of the unseen. O Allah, if You know this matter to be good for my religion, my livelihood, and the outcome of my affairs, then decree it for me and make it easy for me, and bless me in it. And if You know this matter to be bad for my religion, my livelihood, and the outcome of my affairs, then turn it away from me and turn me away from it, and decree for me the good wherever it may be, then make me content with it.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni astakhiruka bi'ilmik, wa astaqdiruka biqudratik, wa as'aluka min fadlikal-'azeem. Fa-innaka taqdiru wa la aqdir, wa ta'lamu wa la a'lam, wa anta 'allamul-ghuyub. Allahumma in kunta ta'lamu anna hadhal-amra khayrun li fi deeni wa ma'ashi wa 'aqibati amri, faqdurhu li wa yassirhu li thumma barik li feeh. Wa in kunta ta'lamu anna hadhal-amra sharrun li fi deeni wa ma'ashi wa 'aqibati amri, fasrifhu 'anni wasrifni 'anhu, waqdur liyal-khayra haythu kana, thumma ardini bihi

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اهْدِنِي فِيمَنْ هَدَيْتَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, guide me among those whom You have guided.

translations.ar: O Allah, guide me among those whom You have guided.
translations.en: O Allah, guide me among those whom You have guided.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma-hdini fiman hadayt

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ ثَبِّتْنِي وَاجْعَلْنِي هَادِيًا مَهْدِيًّا
duas.textEn: O Allah, make me steadfast and make me a guide who is rightly guided.

translations.ar: O Allah, make me steadfast and make me a guide who is rightly guided.
translations.en: O Allah, make me steadfast and make me a guide who is rightly guided.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma thabbitni waj'alni hadiyan mahdiyya

duas.textAr: رَبِّ أَدْخِلْنِي مُدْخَلَ صِدْقٍ وَأَخْرِجْنِي مُخْرَجَ صِدْقٍ وَاجْعَل لِّي مِن لَّدُنكَ سُلْطَانًا نَّصِيرًا
duas.textEn: My Lord, cause me to enter a sound entrance and cause me to exit a sound exit, and grant me from Yourself a supporting authority.
duas.titleEn: Prayer for Truthful Entry and Exit

titleTranslations.en: Prayer for Truthful Entry and Exit

translations.ar: My Lord, cause me to enter a sound entrance and cause me to exit a sound exit, and grant me from Yourself a supporting authority.
translations.en: My Lord, cause me to enter a sound entrance and cause me to exit a sound exit, and grant me from Yourself a supporting authority.

duas.transliterationEn: Rabbi adkhilni mudkhala sidqin wa akhrijni mukhraja sidqin waj'al li min ladunka sultanan nasira

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْماً نَافِعاً، وَرِزْقاً طَيِّباً، وَعَمَلاً مُتَقَبَّلاً
duas.textEn: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, good provision, and accepted deeds.

translations.ar: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, good provision, and accepted deeds.
translations.en: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, good provision, and accepted deeds.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni as'aluka 'ilman nafi'an, wa rizqan tayyiban, wa 'amalan mutaqabbalan

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اكْفِنِي بِحَلاَلِكَ عَنْ حَرَامِكَ، وَأَغْنِنِي بِفَضْلِكَ عَمَّنْ سِوَاكَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, suffice me with what You have made lawful instead of what You have made unlawful, and make me independent of all others besides You.

translations.ar: O Allah, suffice me with what You have made lawful instead of what You have made unlawful, and make me independent of all others besides You.
translations.en: O Allah, suffice me with what You have made lawful instead of what You have made unlawful, and make me independent of all others besides You.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahummak-fini bihalalika 'an haramik, wa aghnini bifadlika 'amman siwak

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَرَبَّ الْأَرْضِ وَرَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ، رَبَّنَا وَرَبَّ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ، أَنْتَ الْغَنِيُّ وَنَحْنُ الْفُقَرَاءُ، أَنْزِلْ عَلَيْنَا الْغَيْثَ وَاجْعَلْ مَا أَنْزَلْتَ لَنَا قُوَّةً وَبَلَاغاً إِلَى حِينٍ
duas.textEn: O Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth and Lord of the Mighty Throne, our Lord and Lord of all things. You are the Rich and we are the poor. Send down rain upon us and make what You send down strength and sustenance for a time.

translations.ar: O Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth and Lord of the Mighty Throne, our Lord and Lord of all things. You are the Rich and we are the poor. Send down rain upon us and make what You send down strength and sustenance for a time.
translations.en: O Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth and Lord of the Mighty Throne, our Lord and Lord of all things. You are the Rich and we are the poor. Send down rain upon us and make what You send down strength and sustenance for a time.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma rabbas-samawati wa rabbal-ardi wa rabbal-'arshil-'azeem, rabbana wa rabba kulli shay', antal-ghaniyyu wa nahnul-fuqara', anzil 'alaynal-ghaytha waj'al ma anzalta lana quwwatan wa balaghan ila heen

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَافِيَةَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ، اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ فِي دِينِي وَدُنْيَايَ وَأَهْلِي وَمَالِي
duas.textEn: O Allah, I ask You for well-being in this world and the Hereafter. O Allah, I ask You for forgiveness and well-being in my religion, my worldly life, my family, and my wealth.

translations.ar: O Allah, I ask You for well-being in this world and the Hereafter. O Allah, I ask You for forgiveness and well-being in my religion, my worldly life, my family, and my wealth.
translations.en: O Allah, I ask You for well-being in this world and the Hereafter. O Allah, I ask You for forgiveness and well-being in my religion, my worldly life, my family, and my wealth.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni as'alukal-'afiyata fid-dunya wal-akhirah, Allahumma inni as'alukal-'afwa wal-'afiyata fi deeni wa dunyaya wa ahli wa mali

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ أَكْثِرْ مَالَهُ وَوَلَدَهُ وَبَارِكْ لَهُ فِيمَا أَعْطَيْتَهُ
duas.textEn: O Allah, increase his wealth and children, and bless him in what You have given him.

translations.ar: O Allah, increase his wealth and children, and bless him in what You have given him.
translations.en: O Allah, increase his wealth and children, and bless him in what You have given him.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma akthir malahu wa waladahu wa barik lahu fima a'taytah

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ رِزْقًا طَيِّبًا، وَعِلْمًا نَافِعًا، وَعَمَلًا مُتَقَبَّلًا
duas.textEn: O Allah, I ask You for good provision, beneficial knowledge, and accepted deeds.

translations.ar: O Allah, I ask You for good provision, beneficial knowledge, and accepted deeds.
translations.en: O Allah, I ask You for good provision, beneficial knowledge, and accepted deeds.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni as'aluka rizqan tayyiba, wa 'ilman nafi'a, wa 'amalan mutaqabbala

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ أَوْسِعْ عَلَيَّ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ الْحَلَالِ، وَاكْفِنِي بِحَلَالِكَ عَنْ حَرَامِكَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, expand for me from Your lawful bounty, and suffice me with what is lawful instead of what is forbidden.

translations.ar: O Allah, expand for me from Your lawful bounty, and suffice me with what is lawful instead of what is forbidden.
translations.en: O Allah, expand for me from Your lawful bounty, and suffice me with what is lawful instead of what is forbidden.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma awsi' 'alayya min fadlikal-halal, wakfini bihalalika 'an haramik

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ أَغْنِنِي بِفَضْلِكَ عَمَّنْ سِوَاكَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, make me independent through Your bounty of all others besides You.

translations.ar: O Allah, make me independent through Your bounty of all others besides You.
translations.en: O Allah, make me independent through Your bounty of all others besides You.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma aghnini bifadlika 'amman siwak

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ النَّاسِ، أَذْهِبِ الْبَاسَ، اشْفِ أَنْتَ الشَّافِي، لاَ شِفَاءَ إِلاَّ شِفَاؤُكَ، شِفَاءً لاَ يُغَادِرُ سَقَماً
duas.textEn: O Allah, Lord of mankind, remove the affliction. Cure, for You are the One who cures. There is no cure except Your cure, a cure that leaves no illness behind.

translations.ar: O Allah, Lord of mankind, remove the affliction. Cure, for You are the One who cures. There is no cure except Your cure, a cure that leaves no illness behind.
translations.en: O Allah, Lord of mankind, remove the affliction. Cure, for You are the One who cures. There is no cure except Your cure, a cure that leaves no illness behind.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma rabban-nas, adhhibil-ba's, ishfi antash-shafi, la shifa'a illa shifa'uk, shifa'an la yughadiru saqaman

duas.textAr: أَسْأَلُ اللهَ الْعَظِيمَ رَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ أَنْ يَشْفِيَكَ
duas.textEn: I ask Allah, the Mighty, Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.

translations.ar: I ask Allah, the Mighty, Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
translations.en: I ask Allah, the Mighty, Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.

duas.transliterationEn: As'alullaha al-'azeem rabbal-'arshil-'azeem an yashfiyak

duas.textAr: أَذْهِبِ الْبَاسَ رَبَّ النَّاسِ، وَاشْفِ أَنْتَ الشَّافِي، لَا شِفَاءَ إِلَّا شِفَاؤُكَ، شِفَاءً لَا يُغَادِرُ سَقَماً
duas.textEn: Remove the affliction, O Lord of mankind, and heal - You are the Healer. There is no healing except Your healing, a healing that leaves no illness behind.

translations.ar: Remove the affliction, O Lord of mankind, and heal - You are the Healer. There is no healing except Your healing, a healing that leaves no illness behind.
translations.en: Remove the affliction, O Lord of mankind, and heal - You are the Healer. There is no healing except Your healing, a healing that leaves no illness behind.

duas.transliterationEn: Adhhibil-ba'sa rabban-nas, washfi antash-shafi, la shifa'a illa shifa'uk, shifa'an la yughadiru saqama

duas.textAr: بِسْمِ اللهِ أَرْقِيكَ، مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ يُؤْذِيكَ، مِنْ شَرِّ كُلِّ نَفْسٍ أَوْ عَيْنِ حَاسِدٍ، اللهُ يَشْفِيكَ، بِسْمِ اللهِ أَرْقِيكَ
duas.textEn: In the name of Allah I perform ruqyah for you, from everything that harms you, from the evil of every soul or envious eye. Allah heals you, in the name of Allah I perform ruqyah for you.

translations.ar: In the name of Allah I perform ruqyah for you, from everything that harms you, from the evil of every soul or envious eye. Allah heals you, in the name of Allah I perform ruqyah for you.
translations.en: In the name of Allah I perform ruqyah for you, from everything that harms you, from the evil of every soul or envious eye. Allah heals you, in the name of Allah I perform ruqyah for you.

duas.transliterationEn: Bismillahi arqeek, min kulli shay'in yu'dheek, min sharri kulli nafsin aw 'aynin hasid, Allahu yashfeek, bismillahi arqeek

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي بَدَنِي، اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي سَمْعِي، اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي بَصَرِي
duas.textEn: O Allah, grant me health in my body. O Allah, grant me health in my hearing. O Allah, grant me health in my sight.

translations.ar: O Allah, grant me health in my body. O Allah, grant me health in my hearing. O Allah, grant me health in my sight.
translations.en: O Allah, grant me health in my body. O Allah, grant me health in my hearing. O Allah, grant me health in my sight.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma 'afini fi badani, Allahumma 'afini fi sam'i, Allahumma 'afini fi basari

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ النَّاسِ، مُذْهِبَ الْبَاسِ، اشْفِ أَنْتَ الشَّافِي، لَا شِفَاءَ إِلَّا شِفَاؤُكَ، شِفَاءً لَا يُغَادِرُ سَقَمًا
duas.textEn: O Allah, Lord of mankind, remove the affliction. Heal, for You are the Healer. There is no healing except Your healing, a healing that leaves no ailment behind.

translations.ar: O Allah, Lord of mankind, remove the affliction. Heal, for You are the Healer. There is no healing except Your healing, a healing that leaves no ailment behind.
translations.en: O Allah, Lord of mankind, remove the affliction. Heal, for You are the Healer. There is no healing except Your healing, a healing that leaves no ailment behind.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma rabban-nas, mudhibal-ba's, ishfi antash-shafi, la shifa'a illa shifa'uk, shifa'an la yughadiru saqama

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَافِيَةَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I ask You for well-being in this world and the Hereafter.

translations.ar: O Allah, I ask You for well-being in this world and the Hereafter.
translations.en: O Allah, I ask You for well-being in this world and the Hereafter.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni as'alukal-'afiyata fid-dunya wal-akhirah

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اشْفِهِ، اللَّهُمَّ اشْفِهِ، اللَّهُمَّ اشْفِهِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, heal him. O Allah, heal him. O Allah, heal him.

translations.ar: O Allah, heal him. O Allah, heal him. O Allah, heal him.
translations.en: O Allah, heal him. O Allah, heal him. O Allah, heal him.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahummash-fihi, Allahummash-fihi, Allahummash-fihi

duas.textAr: أَسْأَلُ اللَّهَ الْعَظِيمَ رَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ أَنْ يَشْفِيَكَ
duas.textEn: I ask Allah the Almighty, Lord of the Magnificent Throne, to heal you.

translations.ar: I ask Allah the Almighty, Lord of the Magnificent Throne, to heal you.
translations.en: I ask Allah the Almighty, Lord of the Magnificent Throne, to heal you.

duas.transliterationEn: As'alullaha-l-'azeema rabbal-'arshil-'azeem an yashfiyak

duas.textAr: لَا بَأْسَ، طَهُورٌ إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ
duas.textEn: No harm, it is a purification if Allah wills.

translations.ar: No harm, it is a purification if Allah wills.
translations.en: No harm, it is a purification if Allah wills.

duas.transliterationEn: La ba'sa, tahoorun in sha Allah

duas.textAr: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ، وَإِنَّا إِلَى رَبِّنَا لَمُنْقَلِبُونَ
duas.textEn: Glory be to Him who has subjected this to us, and we could not have otherwise subdued it. And indeed, to our Lord we will surely return.

translations.ar: Glory be to Him who has subjected this to us, and we could not have otherwise subdued it. And indeed, to our Lord we will surely return.
translations.en: Glory be to Him who has subjected this to us, and we could not have otherwise subdued it. And indeed, to our Lord we will surely return.

duas.transliterationEn: Subhanal-ladhi sakh-khara lana hadha wa ma kunna lahu muqrineen, wa inna ila rabbina lamunqaliboon

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّا نَسْأَلُكَ فِي سَفَرِنَا هَذَا الْبِرَّ وَالتَّقْوَى، وَمِنَ الْعَمَلِ مَا تَرْضَى
duas.textEn: O Allah, we ask You in this journey of ours for righteousness and piety, and for deeds that please You.

translations.ar: O Allah, we ask You in this journey of ours for righteousness and piety, and for deeds that please You.
translations.en: O Allah, we ask You in this journey of ours for righteousness and piety, and for deeds that please You.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inna nas'aluka fi safarina hadhal-birra wat-taqwa, wa minal-'amali ma tarda

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ هَوِّنْ عَلَيْنَا سَفَرَنَا هَذَا، وَاطْوِ عَنَّا بُعْدَهُ، اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ الصَّاحِبُ فِي السَّفَرِ، وَالْخَلِيفَةُ فِي الْأَهْلِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, make this journey of ours easy and shorten its distance for us. O Allah, You are the Companion on the journey and the Guardian of the family.

translations.ar: O Allah, make this journey of ours easy and shorten its distance for us. O Allah, You are the Companion on the journey and the Guardian of the family.
translations.en: O Allah, make this journey of ours easy and shorten its distance for us. O Allah, You are the Companion on the journey and the Guardian of the family.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma hawwin 'alayna safarana hadha, watwi 'anna bu'dah, Allahumma antas-sahibu fis-safar, wal-khalifatu fil-ahl

duas.textAr: آيِبُونَ تَائِبُونَ عَابِدُونَ لِرَبِّنَا حَامِدُونَ
duas.textEn: We return repentant, worshipping, and praising our Lord.

translations.ar: We return repentant, worshipping, and praising our Lord.
translations.en: We return repentant, worshipping, and praising our Lord.

duas.transliterationEn: Ayibuna ta'ibuna 'abiduna lirabbina hamidun

duas.textAr: أَسْتَوْدِعُكُمُ اللهَ الَّذِي لَا تَضِيعُ وَدَائِعُهُ
duas.textEn: I entrust you to Allah, whose trusts are never lost.

translations.ar: I entrust you to Allah, whose trusts are never lost.
translations.en: I entrust you to Allah, whose trusts are never lost.

duas.transliterationEn: Astawdi'ukumullaha alladhi la tadi'u wada'i'uh

duas.textAr: أَسْتَوْدِعُ اللهَ دِينَكَ وَأَمَانَتَكَ وَخَوَاتِيمَ عَمَلِكَ
duas.textEn: I entrust to Allah your religion, your trust, and the conclusions of your deeds.

translations.ar: I entrust to Allah your religion, your trust, and the conclusions of your deeds.
translations.en: I entrust to Allah your religion, your trust, and the conclusions of your deeds.

duas.transliterationEn: Astawdi'ullaha dinaka wa amanataka wa khawatima 'amalik

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اطْوِ لَنَا الْأَرْضَ، وَهَوِّنْ عَلَيْنَا السَّفَرَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, fold the earth for us and make travel easy for us.

translations.ar: O Allah, fold the earth for us and make travel easy for us.
translations.en: O Allah, fold the earth for us and make travel easy for us.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahummut-wi lanal-ard, wa hawwin 'alaynas-safar

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ الصَّاحِبُ فِي السَّفَرِ، وَالْخَلِيفَةُ فِي الْأَهْلِ وَالْمَالِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, You are the Companion on the journey and the Guardian of family and property.

translations.ar: O Allah, You are the Companion on the journey and the Guardian of family and property.
translations.en: O Allah, You are the Companion on the journey and the Guardian of family and property.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma antas-sahibu fis-safar, wal-khalifatu fil-ahli wal-mal

duas.textAr: اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ، اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ، اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ، سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ، وَإِنَّا إِلَى رَبِّنَا لَمُنْقَلِبُونَ، اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّا نَسْأَلُكَ فِي سَفَرِنَا هَذَا الْبِرَّ وَالتَّقْوَى، وَمِنَ الْعَمَلِ مَا تَرْضَى
duas.textEn: Allah is the Greatest, Allah is the Greatest, Allah is the Greatest. Glory be to Him who has subjected this to us, and we could not have subdued it ourselves, and to our Lord we will surely return. O Allah, we ask You on this journey for righteousness and piety, and for deeds that please You.

translations.ar: Allah is the Greatest, Allah is the Greatest, Allah is the Greatest. Glory be to Him who has subjected this to us, and we could not have subdued it ourselves, and to our Lord we will surely return. O Allah, we ask You on this journey for righteousness and piety, and for deeds that please You.
translations.en: Allah is the Greatest, Allah is the Greatest, Allah is the Greatest. Glory be to Him who has subjected this to us, and we could not have subdued it ourselves, and to our Lord we will surely return. O Allah, we ask You on this journey for righteousness and piety, and for deeds that please You.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahu akbar, Allahu akbar, Allahu akbar, subhanal-ladhi sakhkhara lana hadha wa ma kunna lahu muqrinin, wa inna ila rabbina lamunqalibun. Allahumma inna nas'aluka fi safarina hadhal-birra wat-taqwa, wa minal-'amali ma tarda

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ وَعْثَاءِ السَّفَرِ، وَكَآبَةِ الْمَنْظَرِ، وَسُوءِ الْمُنْقَلَبِ فِي الْمَالِ وَالْأَهْلِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the hardships of travel, the sorrow of the sight, and an evil return in wealth and family.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the hardships of travel, the sorrow of the sight, and an evil return in wealth and family.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the hardships of travel, the sorrow of the sight, and an evil return in wealth and family.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min wa'tha'is-safar, wa ka'abatil-manzar, wa su'il-munqalabi fil-mali wal-ahl

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ السَّمَاوَاتِ السَّبْعِ وَمَا أَظْلَلْنَ، وَرَبَّ الْأَرَضِينَ السَّبْعِ وَمَا أَقْلَلْنَ، وَرَبَّ الشَّيَاطِينِ وَمَا أَضْلَلْنَ، وَرَبَّ الرِّيَاحِ وَمَا ذَرَيْنَ، أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ هَذِهِ الْقَرْيَةِ وَخَيْرَ أَهْلِهَا وَخَيْرَ مَا فِيهَا، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهَا وَشَرِّ أَهْلِهَا وَشَرِّ مَا فِيهَا
duas.textEn: O Allah, Lord of the seven heavens and all they shade, Lord of the seven earths and all they carry, Lord of the devils and all they lead astray, Lord of the winds and all they scatter, I ask You for the good of this town and the good of its people and the good it contains. I seek refuge in You from its evil, the evil of its people, and the evil it contains.

translations.ar: O Allah, Lord of the seven heavens and all they shade, Lord of the seven earths and all they carry, Lord of the devils and all they lead astray, Lord of the winds and all they scatter, I ask You for the good of this town and the good of its people and the good it contains. I seek refuge in You from its evil, the evil of its people, and the evil it contains.
translations.en: O Allah, Lord of the seven heavens and all they shade, Lord of the seven earths and all they carry, Lord of the devils and all they lead astray, Lord of the winds and all they scatter, I ask You for the good of this town and the good of its people and the good it contains. I seek refuge in You from its evil, the evil of its people, and the evil it contains.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma rabbas-samawatis-sab'i wa ma adhlaln, wa rabbal-aradeeenas-sab'i wa ma aqlaln, wa rabbash-shayateeni wa ma adlaln, wa rabbar-riyahi wa ma dharayn, as'aluka khayra hadhihil-qaryati wa khayra ahliha wa khayra ma feeha, wa a'udhu bika min sharriha wa sharri ahliha wa sharri ma feeha

duas.textAr: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ وَهُوَ حَيٌّ لَا يَمُوتُ، بِيَدِهِ الْخَيْرُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
duas.textEn: There is no deity but Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs the dominion and all praise. He gives life and causes death. He is Ever-Living and does not die. In His Hand is all good, and He is over all things Omnipotent.

translations.ar: There is no deity but Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs the dominion and all praise. He gives life and causes death. He is Ever-Living and does not die. In His Hand is all good, and He is over all things Omnipotent.
translations.en: There is no deity but Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs the dominion and all praise. He gives life and causes death. He is Ever-Living and does not die. In His Hand is all good, and He is over all things Omnipotent.

duas.transliterationEn: La ilaha illallahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu yuhyi wa yumeet, wa huwa hayyun la yamoot, biyadihil-khayr, wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadeer

duas.textAr: سُبْحَانَ اللهِ (عند النزول)، اللهُ أَكْبَرُ (عند الصعود)
duas.textEn: SubhanAllah (when descending), Allahu Akbar (when ascending). (The Prophet would say Takbir when ascending a hill and Tasbih when descending.)

translations.ar: SubhanAllah (when descending), Allahu Akbar (when ascending). (The Prophet would say Takbir when ascending a hill and Tasbih when descending.)
translations.en: SubhanAllah (when descending), Allahu Akbar (when ascending). (The Prophet would say Takbir when ascending a hill and Tasbih when descending.)

duas.transliterationEn: SubhanAllah ('inda an-nuzool), Allahu Akbar ('inda as-su'ood)

duas.textAr: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
duas.textEn: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created. (Whoever says this when stopping somewhere, nothing will harm him until he moves on.)

translations.ar: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created. (Whoever says this when stopping somewhere, nothing will harm him until he moves on.)
translations.en: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created. (Whoever says this when stopping somewhere, nothing will harm him until he moves on.)

duas.transliterationEn: A'udhu bikalimatillahit-tammati min sharri ma khalaq

duas.textAr: رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَاجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَاماً
duas.textEn: Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us an example for the righteous.

translations.ar: Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us an example for the righteous.
translations.en: Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us an example for the righteous.

duas.transliterationEn: Rabbana hab lana min azwajina wa dhurriyyatina qurrata a'yunin waj'alna lil-muttaqina imama

duas.textAr: رَبِّ اجْعَلْنِي مُقِيمَ الصَّلاَةِ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِي رَبَّنَا وَتَقَبَّلْ دُعَاء
duas.textEn: My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and from my descendants. Our Lord, and accept my supplication.

translations.ar: My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and from my descendants. Our Lord, and accept my supplication.
translations.en: My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and from my descendants. Our Lord, and accept my supplication.

duas.transliterationEn: Rabbij'alni muqimas-salati wa min dhurriyyati rabbana wa taqabbal du'a

duas.textAr: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِن لَّدُنكَ ذُرِّيَّةً طَيِّبَةً إِنَّكَ سَمِيعُ الدُّعَاءِ
duas.textEn: My Lord, grant me from Yourself a good offspring. Indeed, You are the Hearer of supplication.

translations.ar: My Lord, grant me from Yourself a good offspring. Indeed, You are the Hearer of supplication.
translations.en: My Lord, grant me from Yourself a good offspring. Indeed, You are the Hearer of supplication.

duas.transliterationEn: Rabbi hab li min ladunka dhurriyyatan tayyibah, innaka sami'ud-du'a

duas.textAr: رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِي أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَى وَالِدَيَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَالِحاً تَرْضَاهُ وَأَصْلِحْ لِي فِي ذُرِّيَّتِي
duas.textEn: My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to do righteousness of which You approve. And make righteous for me my offspring.

translations.ar: My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to do righteousness of which You approve. And make righteous for me my offspring.
translations.en: My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to do righteousness of which You approve. And make righteous for me my offspring.

duas.transliterationEn: Rabbi awzi'ni an ashkura ni'matakal-lati an'amta 'alayya wa 'ala walidayya wa an a'mala salihan tardahu wa aslih li fi dhurriyyati

duas.textAr: رَبَّنَا اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الْحِسَابُ
duas.textEn: Our Lord, forgive me and my parents and the believers on the Day the account is established.

translations.ar: Our Lord, forgive me and my parents and the believers on the Day the account is established.
translations.en: Our Lord, forgive me and my parents and the believers on the Day the account is established.

duas.transliterationEn: Rabbana-ghfir li wa liwalidayya wa lil-mu'minina yawma yaqumul-hisab

duas.textAr: رَّبِّ ارْحَمْهُمَا كَمَا رَبَّيَانِي صَغِيراً
duas.textEn: My Lord, have mercy upon them as they brought me up when I was small.

translations.ar: My Lord, have mercy upon them as they brought me up when I was small.
translations.en: My Lord, have mercy upon them as they brought me up when I was small.

duas.transliterationEn: Rabbir-hamhuma kama rabbayani saghira

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِي أَهْلِنَا
duas.textEn: O Allah, bless us in our family.

translations.ar: O Allah, bless us in our family.
translations.en: O Allah, bless us in our family.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma barik lana fi ahlina

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ أَلِّفْ بَيْنَ قُلُوبِنَا، وَأَصْلِحْ ذَاتَ بَيْنِنَا
duas.textEn: O Allah, join our hearts together and reconcile between us.

translations.ar: O Allah, join our hearts together and reconcile between us.
translations.en: O Allah, join our hearts together and reconcile between us.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma allif bayna qulubina, wa aslih dhata baynina

duas.textAr: بَارَكَ اللهُ لَكَ فِي الْمَوْهُوبِ لَكَ، وَشَكَرْتَ الْوَاهِبَ، وَبَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُ، وَرُزِقْتَ بِرَّهُ
duas.textEn: May Allah bless you with what He has given you. May you give thanks to the Giver, may the child reach full maturity, and may you be granted his righteousness.

translations.ar: May Allah bless you with what He has given you. May you give thanks to the Giver, may the child reach full maturity, and may you be granted his righteousness.
translations.en: May Allah bless you with what He has given you. May you give thanks to the Giver, may the child reach full maturity, and may you be granted his righteousness.

duas.transliterationEn: Barakallahu laka fil-mawhubi lak, wa shakarta-l-wahib, wa balagha ashuddah, wa ruziqta birrah

duas.textAr: بَارَكَ اللهُ لَكَ، وَبَارَكَ عَلَيْكَ، وَجَزَاكَ اللهُ خَيْراً، وَرَزَقَكَ اللهُ مِثْلَهُ، وَأَجْزَلَ ثَوَابَكَ
duas.textEn: May Allah bless you, and bestow blessings upon you, may Allah reward you with good, grant you the like of it, and multiply your reward.

translations.ar: May Allah bless you, and bestow blessings upon you, may Allah reward you with good, grant you the like of it, and multiply your reward.
translations.en: May Allah bless you, and bestow blessings upon you, may Allah reward you with good, grant you the like of it, and multiply your reward.

duas.transliterationEn: Barakallahu lak, wa baraka 'alayk, wa jazakallahu khayran, wa razaqakallahu mithlah, wa ajzala thawabak

duas.textAr: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ الْعَظِيمُ الْحَلِيمُ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَرَبُّ الْأَرْضِ وَرَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْكَرِيمِ
duas.textEn: There is no deity except Allah, the Magnificent, the Forbearing. There is no deity except Allah, Lord of the Magnificent Throne. There is no deity except Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth and Lord of the Noble Throne.

translations.ar: There is no deity except Allah, the Magnificent, the Forbearing. There is no deity except Allah, Lord of the Magnificent Throne. There is no deity except Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth and Lord of the Noble Throne.
translations.en: There is no deity except Allah, the Magnificent, the Forbearing. There is no deity except Allah, Lord of the Magnificent Throne. There is no deity except Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth and Lord of the Noble Throne.

duas.transliterationEn: La ilaha illallahul-'azeemul-haleem, la ilaha illallahu rabbul-'arshil-'azeem, la ilaha illallahu rabbus-samawati wa rabbul-ardi wa rabbul-'arshil-kareem

duas.textAr: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ
duas.textEn: There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers.

translations.ar: There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers.
translations.en: There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers.

duas.transliterationEn: La ilaha illa anta subhanaka inni kuntu minaz-zalimeen

duas.textAr: حَسْبُنَا اللهُ وَنِعْمَ الْوَكِيلُ
duas.textEn: Sufficient for us is Allah, and He is the best Disposer of affairs.

translations.ar: Sufficient for us is Allah, and He is the best Disposer of affairs.
translations.en: Sufficient for us is Allah, and He is the best Disposer of affairs.

duas.transliterationEn: Hasbunallahu wa ni'mal-wakeel

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ رَحْمَتَكَ أَرْجُو فَلَا تَكِلْنِي إِلَى نَفْسِي طَرْفَةَ عَيْنٍ، وَأَصْلِحْ لِي شَأْنِي كُلَّهُ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I hope for Your mercy. Do not leave me to myself even for the blink of an eye. Correct all of my affairs for me. There is no deity except You.

translations.ar: O Allah, I hope for Your mercy. Do not leave me to myself even for the blink of an eye. Correct all of my affairs for me. There is no deity except You.
translations.en: O Allah, I hope for Your mercy. Do not leave me to myself even for the blink of an eye. Correct all of my affairs for me. There is no deity except You.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma rahmataka arju fala takilni ila nafsi tarfata 'ayn, wa aslih li sha'ni kullah, la ilaha illa ant

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ لَا سَهْلَ إِلَّا مَا جَعَلْتَهُ سَهْلاً، وَأَنْتَ تَجْعَلُ الْحَزْنَ إِذَا شِئْتَ سَهْلاً
duas.textEn: O Allah, there is no ease except what You make easy, and You can make difficulty easy if You wish.

translations.ar: O Allah, there is no ease except what You make easy, and You can make difficulty easy if You wish.
translations.en: O Allah, there is no ease except what You make easy, and You can make difficulty easy if You wish.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma la sahla illa ma ja'altahu sahla, wa anta taj'alul-hazna idha shi'ta sahla

duas.textAr: يَا حَيُّ يَا قَيُّومُ بِرَحْمَتِكَ أَسْتَغِيثُ
duas.textEn: O Ever-Living, O Sustainer, by Your mercy I seek help.

translations.ar: O Ever-Living, O Sustainer, by Your mercy I seek help.
translations.en: O Ever-Living, O Sustainer, by Your mercy I seek help.

duas.transliterationEn: Ya Hayyu ya Qayyum, bi rahmatika astaghith

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي عَبْدُكَ، ابْنُ عَبْدِكَ، ابْنُ أَمَتِكَ، نَاصِيَتِي بِيَدِكَ، مَاضٍ فِيَّ حُكْمُكَ، عَدْلٌ فِيَّ قَضَاؤُكَ، أَسْأَلُكَ بِكُلِّ اسْمٍ هُوَ لَكَ سَمَّيْتَ بِهِ نَفْسَكَ، أَوْ أَنْزَلْتَهُ فِي كِتَابِكَ، أَوْ عَلَّمْتَهُ أَحَدًا مِنْ خَلْقِكَ، أَوِ اسْتَأْثَرْتَ بِهِ فِي عِلْمِ الْغَيْبِ عِنْدَكَ، أَنْ تَجْعَلَ الْقُرْآنَ رَبِيعَ قَلْبِي، وَنُورَ صَدْرِي، وَجَلَاءَ حُزْنِي، وَذَهَابَ هَمِّي
duas.textEn: O Allah, I am Your servant, son of Your servant, son of Your maidservant. My forelock is in Your hand. Your command over me is ever executed and Your decree over me is just. I ask You by every name belonging to You which You have named Yourself with, or revealed in Your Book, or taught to any of Your creation, or kept to Yourself in the knowledge of the Unseen with You, that You make the Quran the spring of my heart and the light of my chest, and a departure for my sorrow and a release for my anxiety.

translations.ar: O Allah, I am Your servant, son of Your servant, son of Your maidservant. My forelock is in Your hand. Your command over me is ever executed and Your decree over me is just. I ask You by every name belonging to You which You have named Yourself with, or revealed in Your Book, or taught to any of Your creation, or kept to Yourself in the knowledge of the Unseen with You, that You make the Quran the spring of my heart and the light of my chest, and a departure for my sorrow and a release for my anxiety.
translations.en: O Allah, I am Your servant, son of Your servant, son of Your maidservant. My forelock is in Your hand. Your command over me is ever executed and Your decree over me is just. I ask You by every name belonging to You which You have named Yourself with, or revealed in Your Book, or taught to any of Your creation, or kept to Yourself in the knowledge of the Unseen with You, that You make the Quran the spring of my heart and the light of my chest, and a departure for my sorrow and a release for my anxiety.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni 'abduk, ibnu 'abdik, ibnu amatik, nasiyati biyadik, madin fiyya hukmuk, 'adlun fiyya qada'uk, as'aluka bikulli ismin huwa lak sammayta bihi nafsak, aw anzaltahu fi kitabik, aw 'allamtahu ahadan min khalqik, awista'tharta bihi fi 'ilmil-ghaybi 'indak, an taj'alal-Qur'ana rabi'a qalbi, wa nura sadri, wa jala'a huzni, wa dhahaba hammi

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ، وَالْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ، وَالْبُخْلِ وَالْجُبْنِ، وَضَلَعِ الدَّيْنِ وَغَلَبَةِ الرِّجَالِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from worry and grief, from incapacity and laziness, from miserliness and cowardice, from being heavily in debt and being overpowered by men.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from worry and grief, from incapacity and laziness, from miserliness and cowardice, from being heavily in debt and being overpowered by men.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from worry and grief, from incapacity and laziness, from miserliness and cowardice, from being heavily in debt and being overpowered by men.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazan, wal-'ajzi wal-kasal, wal-bukhli wal-jubn, wa dala'id-dayni wa ghalabatir-rijal

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اكْفِنِي بِحَلَالِكَ عَنْ حَرَامِكَ، وَأَغْنِنِي بِفَضْلِكَ عَمَّنْ سِوَاكَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, suffice me with what You have allowed instead of what You have forbidden, and make me independent of all others besides You.

translations.ar: O Allah, suffice me with what You have allowed instead of what You have forbidden, and make me independent of all others besides You.
translations.en: O Allah, suffice me with what You have allowed instead of what You have forbidden, and make me independent of all others besides You.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahummak-fini bihalalika 'an haramik, wa aghnini bifadlika 'amman siwak

duas.textAr: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ الْعَظِيمُ الْحَلِيمُ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَرَبُّ الْأَرْضِ، رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْكَرِيمِ
duas.textEn: There is no deity except Allah, the Magnificent, the Forbearing. There is no deity except Allah, Lord of the Magnificent Throne. There is no deity except Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, Lord of the Noble Throne.

translations.ar: There is no deity except Allah, the Magnificent, the Forbearing. There is no deity except Allah, Lord of the Magnificent Throne. There is no deity except Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, Lord of the Noble Throne.
translations.en: There is no deity except Allah, the Magnificent, the Forbearing. There is no deity except Allah, Lord of the Magnificent Throne. There is no deity except Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, Lord of the Noble Throne.

duas.transliterationEn: La ilaha illallahul-'azeemul-haleem, la ilaha illallahu rabbul-'arshil-'azeem, la ilaha illallahu rabbus-samawati wa rabbul-ard, rabbul-'arshil-kareem

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ أَعِنِّي عَلَى ذِكْرِكَ، وَشُكْرِكَ، وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِكَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, help me to remember You, to thank You, and to worship You properly.

translations.ar: O Allah, help me to remember You, to thank You, and to worship You properly.
translations.en: O Allah, help me to remember You, to thank You, and to worship You properly.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma a'inni 'ala dhikrika, wa shukrika, wa husni 'ibadatik

duas.textAr: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَطْعَمَنَا وَسَقَانَا وَكَفَانَا وَآوَانَا، فَكَمْ مِمَّنْ لَا كَافِيَ لَهُ وَلَا مُؤْوِيَ
duas.textEn: All praise is due to Allah who fed us and gave us drink, and sufficed us and sheltered us, for how many have neither sufficient nor shelter.

translations.ar: All praise is due to Allah who fed us and gave us drink, and sufficed us and sheltered us, for how many have neither sufficient nor shelter.
translations.en: All praise is due to Allah who fed us and gave us drink, and sufficed us and sheltered us, for how many have neither sufficient nor shelter.

duas.transliterationEn: Alhamdulillahil-ladhi at'amana wa saqana wa kafana wa awana, fakam mimman la kafiya lahu wa la mu'wiya

duas.textAr: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ عَلَى كُلِّ حَالٍ
duas.textEn: All praise is due to Allah in all circumstances.

translations.ar: All praise is due to Allah in all circumstances.
translations.en: All praise is due to Allah in all circumstances.

duas.transliterationEn: Alhamdulillahi 'ala kulli hal

duas.textAr: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي بِنِعْمَتِهِ تَتِمُّ الصَّالِحَاتُ
duas.textEn: All praise is due to Allah by whose grace good deeds are completed.

translations.ar: All praise is due to Allah by whose grace good deeds are completed.
translations.en: All praise is due to Allah by whose grace good deeds are completed.

duas.transliterationEn: Alhamdulillahil-ladhi bini'matihi tatimmus-salihat

duas.textAr: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي عَافَانِي مِمَّا ابْتَلَاكَ بِهِ وَفَضَّلَنِي عَلَى كَثِيرٍ مِمَّنْ خَلَقَ تَفْضِيلاً
duas.textEn: All praise is due to Allah who spared me from what He has afflicted you with and has favored me over many of His creation.

translations.ar: All praise is due to Allah who spared me from what He has afflicted you with and has favored me over many of His creation.
translations.en: All praise is due to Allah who spared me from what He has afflicted you with and has favored me over many of His creation.

duas.transliterationEn: Alhamdulillahil-ladhi 'afani mimma-btalaka bihi wa faddalani 'ala kathirin mimman khalaqa tafdila

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ مَا أَصْبَحَ بِي مِنْ نِعْمَةٍ أَوْ بِأَحَدٍ مِنْ خَلْقِكَ فَمِنْكَ وَحْدَكَ لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ، فَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ وَلَكَ الشُّكْرُ
duas.textEn: O Allah, whatever blessing I or any of Your creation has received this morning is from You alone, without partner. So for You is all praise and to You is all thanks.

translations.ar: O Allah, whatever blessing I or any of Your creation has received this morning is from You alone, without partner. So for You is all praise and to You is all thanks.
translations.en: O Allah, whatever blessing I or any of Your creation has received this morning is from You alone, without partner. So for You is all praise and to You is all thanks.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma ma asbaha bi min ni'matin aw bi-ahadin min khalqika faminka wahdaka la shareeka lak, falakal-hamdu wa lakash-shukr

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ أَعِنِّي عَلَى ذِكْرِكَ وَشُكْرِكَ وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِكَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, help me to remember You, to thank You, and to worship You properly.

translations.ar: O Allah, help me to remember You, to thank You, and to worship You properly.
translations.en: O Allah, help me to remember You, to thank You, and to worship You properly.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma a'inni 'ala dhikrika wa shukrika wa husni 'ibadatik

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ كُلُّهُ، وَلَكَ الْمُلْكُ كُلُّهُ، وَبِيَدِكَ الْخَيْرُ كُلُّهُ، وَإِلَيْكَ يُرْجَعُ الْأَمْرُ كُلُّهُ
duas.textEn: O Allah, to You belongs all praise, to You belongs all sovereignty, in Your hand is all good, and to You all matters return.

translations.ar: O Allah, to You belongs all praise, to You belongs all sovereignty, in Your hand is all good, and to You all matters return.
translations.en: O Allah, to You belongs all praise, to You belongs all sovereignty, in Your hand is all good, and to You all matters return.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma lakal-hamdu kulluh, wa lakal-mulku kulluh, wa biyadikal-khayru kulluh, wa ilayka yurja'ul-amru kulluh

duas.textAr: رَبِّ زِدْنِي عِلْماً
