duas.textEn: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.

translations.ar: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.
translations.en: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.

duas.transliterationEn: Rabbi zidni 'ilma

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ انْفَعْنِي بِمَا عَلَّمْتَنِي، وَعَلِّمْنِي مَا يَنْفَعُنِي، وَزِدْنِي عِلْماً
duas.textEn: O Allah, benefit me with what You have taught me, teach me what will benefit me, and increase me in knowledge.

translations.ar: O Allah, benefit me with what You have taught me, teach me what will benefit me, and increase me in knowledge.
translations.en: O Allah, benefit me with what You have taught me, teach me what will benefit me, and increase me in knowledge.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma-nfa'ni bima 'allamtani, wa 'allimni ma yanfa'uni, wa zidni 'ilma

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عِلْمٍ لَا يَنْفَعُ، وَمِنْ قَلْبٍ لَا يَخْشَعُ، وَمِنْ نَفْسٍ لَا تَشْبَعُ، وَمِنْ دَعْوَةٍ لَا يُسْتَجَابُ لَهَا
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from knowledge that does not benefit, from a heart that does not fear, from a soul that is not satisfied, and from a supplication that is not answered.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from knowledge that does not benefit, from a heart that does not fear, from a soul that is not satisfied, and from a supplication that is not answered.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from knowledge that does not benefit, from a heart that does not fear, from a soul that is not satisfied, and from a supplication that is not answered.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min 'ilmin la yanfa', wa min qalbin la yakhsha', wa min nafsin la tashba', wa min da'watin la yustajabu laha

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ فَقِّهْنِي فِي الدِّينِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, grant me understanding of the religion.

translations.ar: O Allah, grant me understanding of the religion.
translations.en: O Allah, grant me understanding of the religion.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma faqqihni fid-deen

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ أَرِنِي الْحَقَّ حَقًّا وَارْزُقْنِي اتِّبَاعَهُ، وَأَرِنِي الْبَاطِلَ بَاطِلًا وَارْزُقْنِي اجْتِنَابَهُ
duas.textEn: O Allah, show me the truth as truth and grant me the ability to follow it, and show me falsehood as falsehood and grant me the ability to avoid it.

translations.ar: O Allah, show me the truth as truth and grant me the ability to follow it, and show me falsehood as falsehood and grant me the ability to avoid it.
translations.en: O Allah, show me the truth as truth and grant me the ability to follow it, and show me falsehood as falsehood and grant me the ability to avoid it.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma arinal-haqqa haqqan warzuqnat-tiba'ah, wa arinal-batila batilan warzuqnaj-tinabah

duas.textAr: رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي، وَيَسِّرْ لِي أَمْرِي، وَاحْلُلْ عُقْدَةً مِنْ لِسَانِي يَفْقَهُوا قَوْلِي
duas.textEn: My Lord, expand for me my chest, ease for me my task, and untie the knot from my tongue so they may understand my speech.

translations.ar: My Lord, expand for me my chest, ease for me my task, and untie the knot from my tongue so they may understand my speech.
translations.en: My Lord, expand for me my chest, ease for me my task, and untie the knot from my tongue so they may understand my speech.

duas.transliterationEn: Rabbish-rahli sadri, wa yassir li amri, wahlul 'uqdatan min lisani yafqahu qawli

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْمًا نَافِعًا، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عِلْمٍ لَا يَنْفَعُ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, and I seek refuge in You from knowledge that does not benefit.

translations.ar: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, and I seek refuge in You from knowledge that does not benefit.
translations.en: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, and I seek refuge in You from knowledge that does not benefit.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni as'aluka 'ilman nafi'a, wa a'udhu bika min 'ilmin la yanfa'

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ فَهِّمْنِي فِي الدِّينِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, grant me understanding of the religion.

translations.ar: O Allah, grant me understanding of the religion.
translations.en: O Allah, grant me understanding of the religion.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma fahhimni fid-din

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ عَلِّمْنِي مَا يَنْفَعُنِي، وَانْفَعْنِي بِمَا عَلَّمْتَنِي، وَزِدْنِي عِلْمًا
duas.textEn: O Allah, teach me what will benefit me, benefit me from what You have taught me, and increase me in knowledge.

translations.ar: O Allah, teach me what will benefit me, benefit me from what You have taught me, and increase me in knowledge.
translations.en: O Allah, teach me what will benefit me, benefit me from what You have taught me, and increase me in knowledge.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma 'allimni ma yanfa'uni, wanfa'ni bima 'allamtani, wa zidni 'ilma

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ فَهْمَ النَّبِيِّينَ، وَحِفْظَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ الْمُقَرَّبِينَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I ask You for the understanding of the Prophets and the memory of the Messengers who are near to You.

translations.ar: O Allah, I ask You for the understanding of the Prophets and the memory of the Messengers who are near to You.
translations.en: O Allah, I ask You for the understanding of the Prophets and the memory of the Messengers who are near to You.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni as'aluka fahman-nabiyyin, wa hifzal-mursalinal-muqarrabin

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ فِي قَلْبِي نُورًا، وَفِي لِسَانِي نُورًا، وَاجْعَلْ فِي سَمْعِي نُورًا، وَاجْعَلْ فِي بَصَرِي نُورًا
duas.textEn: O Allah, place light in my heart, light on my tongue, light in my hearing, and light in my sight.

translations.ar: O Allah, place light in my heart, light on my tongue, light in my hearing, and light in my sight.
translations.en: O Allah, place light in my heart, light on my tongue, light in my hearing, and light in my sight.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahummaj'al fi qalbi nura, wa fi lisani nura, waj'al fi sam'i nura, waj'al fi basari nura

duas.textAr: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
duas.textEn: Our Lord, give us in this world that which is good and in the Hereafter that which is good and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.

translations.ar: Our Lord, give us in this world that which is good and in the Hereafter that which is good and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.
translations.en: Our Lord, give us in this world that which is good and in the Hereafter that which is good and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.

duas.transliterationEn: Rabbana atina fid-dunya hasanatan wa fil-akhirati hasanatan wa qina 'adhaban-nar

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ أَصْلِحْ لِي دِينِي الَّذِي هُوَ عِصْمَةُ أَمْرِي، وَأَصْلِحْ لِي دُنْيَايَ الَّتِي فِيهَا مَعَاشِي، وَأَصْلِحْ لِي آخِرَتِي الَّتِي فِيهَا مَعَادِي، وَاجْعَلِ الْحَيَاةَ زِيَادَةً لِي فِي كُلِّ خَيْرٍ، وَاجْعَلِ الْمَوْتَ رَاحَةً لِي مِنْ كُلِّ شَرٍّ
duas.textEn: O Allah, set right for me my religion which is the safeguard of my affairs. Set right for me my worldly life wherein is my livelihood. Set right for me my Hereafter to which is my return. Make life for me an increase in every good, and make death a relief for me from every evil.

translations.ar: O Allah, set right for me my religion which is the safeguard of my affairs. Set right for me my worldly life wherein is my livelihood. Set right for me my Hereafter to which is my return. Make life for me an increase in every good, and make death a relief for me from every evil.
translations.en: O Allah, set right for me my religion which is the safeguard of my affairs. Set right for me my worldly life wherein is my livelihood. Set right for me my Hereafter to which is my return. Make life for me an increase in every good, and make death a relief for me from every evil.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma aslih li deeni-alladhi huwa 'ismatu amri, wa aslih li dunyaya-allati fiha ma'ashi, wa aslih li akhirati-allati fiha ma'adi, waj'alil-hayata ziyadatan li fi kulli khayr, waj'alil-mawta rahatan li min kulli sharr

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنَ الْخَيْرِ كُلِّهِ عَاجِلِهِ وَآجِلِهِ، مَا عَلِمْتُ مِنْهُ وَمَا لَمْ أَعْلَمْ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الشَّرِّ كُلِّهِ عَاجِلِهِ وَآجِلِهِ، مَا عَلِمْتُ مِنْهُ وَمَا لَمْ أَعْلَمْ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I ask You for all good, both sooner and later, what I know of it and what I do not know. I seek refuge in You from all evil, both sooner and later, what I know of it and what I do not know.

translations.ar: O Allah, I ask You for all good, both sooner and later, what I know of it and what I do not know. I seek refuge in You from all evil, both sooner and later, what I know of it and what I do not know.
translations.en: O Allah, I ask You for all good, both sooner and later, what I know of it and what I do not know. I seek refuge in You from all evil, both sooner and later, what I know of it and what I do not know.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni as'aluka minal-khayri kullihi 'ajilihi wa ajilihi, ma 'alimtu minhu wa ma lam a'lam, wa a'udhu bika minash-sharri kullihi 'ajilihi wa ajilihi, ma 'alimtu minhu wa ma lam a'lam

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْجَنَّةَ وَمَا قَرَّبَ إِلَيْهَا مِنْ قَوْلٍ أَوْ عَمَلٍ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ النَّارِ وَمَا قَرَّبَ إِلَيْهَا مِنْ قَوْلٍ أَوْ عَمَلٍ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I ask You for Paradise and whatever brings me closer to it of words and deeds. I seek refuge in You from the Fire and whatever brings me closer to it of words and deeds.

translations.ar: O Allah, I ask You for Paradise and whatever brings me closer to it of words and deeds. I seek refuge in You from the Fire and whatever brings me closer to it of words and deeds.
translations.en: O Allah, I ask You for Paradise and whatever brings me closer to it of words and deeds. I seek refuge in You from the Fire and whatever brings me closer to it of words and deeds.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni as'alukal-jannata wa ma qarraba ilayha min qawlin aw 'amal, wa a'udhu bika minan-nar wa ma qarraba ilayha min qawlin aw 'amal

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ أَحْسِنْ عَاقِبَتَنَا فِي الْأُمُورِ كُلِّهَا، وَأَجِرْنَا مِنْ خِزْيِ الدُّنْيَا وَعَذَابِ الْآخِرَةِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, make good the outcome of all our affairs and save us from the disgrace of this world and the punishment of the Hereafter.

translations.ar: O Allah, make good the outcome of all our affairs and save us from the disgrace of this world and the punishment of the Hereafter.
translations.en: O Allah, make good the outcome of all our affairs and save us from the disgrace of this world and the punishment of the Hereafter.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma ahsin 'aqibatana fil-umuri kulliha, wa ajirna min khizyid-dunya wa 'adhabul-akhirah

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اقْسِمْ لَنَا مِنْ خَشْيَتِكَ مَا تَحُولُ بِهِ بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَ مَعَاصِيكَ، وَمِنْ طَاعَتِكَ مَا تُبَلِّغُنَا بِهِ جَنَّتَكَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, apportion to us such fear of You as will come between us and acts of disobedience to You, and such obedience to You as will bring us to Your Paradise.

translations.ar: O Allah, apportion to us such fear of You as will come between us and acts of disobedience to You, and such obedience to You as will bring us to Your Paradise.
translations.en: O Allah, apportion to us such fear of You as will come between us and acts of disobedience to You, and such obedience to You as will bring us to Your Paradise.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahummaq-sim lana min khashyatika ma tahulu bihi baynana wa bayna ma'asik, wa min ta'atika ma tuballighuna bihi jannatak

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, give us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.

translations.ar: O Allah, give us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.
translations.en: O Allah, give us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma atina fid-dunya hasanatan wa fil-akhirati hasanatan wa qina 'adhaban-nar

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الثَّبَاتَ فِي الْأَمْرِ، وَالْعَزِيمَةَ عَلَى الرُّشْدِ، وَأَسْأَلُكَ شُكْرَ نِعْمَتِكَ، وَحُسْنَ عِبَادَتِكَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I ask You for steadfastness in affairs, and determination upon guidance. I ask You for gratitude for Your blessings and excellence in worshipping You.

translations.ar: O Allah, I ask You for steadfastness in affairs, and determination upon guidance. I ask You for gratitude for Your blessings and excellence in worshipping You.
translations.en: O Allah, I ask You for steadfastness in affairs, and determination upon guidance. I ask You for gratitude for Your blessings and excellence in worshipping You.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni as'alukat-thabata fil-amr, wal-'azimata 'alar-rushd, wa as'aluka shukra ni'matik, wa husna 'ibadatik

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ قَلْبًا سَلِيمًا، وَلِسَانًا صَادِقًا
duas.textEn: O Allah, I ask You for a sound heart and a truthful tongue.

translations.ar: O Allah, I ask You for a sound heart and a truthful tongue.
translations.en: O Allah, I ask You for a sound heart and a truthful tongue.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni as'aluka qalban salima, wa lisanan sadiqa

duas.textAr: بِاسْمِكَ اللَّهُمَّ أَمُوتُ وَأَحْيَا
duas.textEn: In Your name O Allah, I die and I live.

translations.ar: In Your name O Allah, I die and I live.
translations.en: In Your name O Allah, I die and I live.

duas.transliterationEn: Bismika Allahumma amootu wa ahya

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ قِنِي عَذَابَكَ يَوْمَ تَبْعَثُ عِبَادَكَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, protect me from Your punishment on the Day You resurrect Your servants.

translations.ar: O Allah, protect me from Your punishment on the Day You resurrect Your servants.
translations.en: O Allah, protect me from Your punishment on the Day You resurrect Your servants.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma qini 'adhabaka yawma tab'athu 'ibadak

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ أَسْلَمْتُ نَفْسِي إِلَيْكَ، وَفَوَّضْتُ أَمْرِي إِلَيْكَ، وَوَجَّهْتُ وَجْهِي إِلَيْكَ، وَأَلْجَأْتُ ظَهْرِي إِلَيْكَ، رَغْبَةً وَرَهْبَةً إِلَيْكَ، لَا مَلْجَأَ وَلَا مَنْجَا مِنْكَ إِلَّا إِلَيْكَ، آمَنْتُ بِكِتَابِكَ الَّذِي أَنْزَلْتَ، وَبِنَبِيِّكَ الَّذِي أَرْسَلْتَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I submit myself to You, entrust my affairs to You, turn my face to You, and lay myself down depending upon You, hoping in You and fearing You. There is no refuge and no escape from You except to You. I believe in Your Book which You have revealed, and in Your Prophet whom You have sent.

translations.ar: O Allah, I submit myself to You, entrust my affairs to You, turn my face to You, and lay myself down depending upon You, hoping in You and fearing You. There is no refuge and no escape from You except to You. I believe in Your Book which You have revealed, and in Your Prophet whom You have sent.
translations.en: O Allah, I submit myself to You, entrust my affairs to You, turn my face to You, and lay myself down depending upon You, hoping in You and fearing You. There is no refuge and no escape from You except to You. I believe in Your Book which You have revealed, and in Your Prophet whom You have sent.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma aslamtu nafsi ilayk, wa fawwadtu amri ilayk, wa wajjahtu wajhi ilayk, wa alja'tu zahri ilayk, raghbatan wa rahbatan ilayk, la malja'a wa la manja minka illa ilayk, amantu bikitabikal-ladhi anzalt, wa binabiyyikal-ladhi arsalt

duas.textAr: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَحْيَانَا بَعْدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورُ
duas.textEn: All praise is due to Allah, who gave us life after He caused us to die, and to Him is the resurrection.

translations.ar: All praise is due to Allah, who gave us life after He caused us to die, and to Him is the resurrection.
translations.en: All praise is due to Allah, who gave us life after He caused us to die, and to Him is the resurrection.

duas.transliterationEn: Alhamdulillahil-ladhi ahyana ba'da ma amatana wa ilayhin-nushoor

duas.textAr: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ، وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ، سُبْحَانَ اللهِ، وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ، وَلَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ، وَاللهُ أَكْبَرُ، وَلَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ الْعَلِيِّ الْعَظِيمِ
duas.textEn: There is no deity except Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him is praise, and He is over all things competent. Glory be to Allah, and praise be to Allah, and there is no deity except Allah, and Allah is the Greatest, and there is no power nor might except with Allah, the Most High, the Most Great.

translations.ar: There is no deity except Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him is praise, and He is over all things competent. Glory be to Allah, and praise be to Allah, and there is no deity except Allah, and Allah is the Greatest, and there is no power nor might except with Allah, the Most High, the Most Great.
translations.en: There is no deity except Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him is praise, and He is over all things competent. Glory be to Allah, and praise be to Allah, and there is no deity except Allah, and Allah is the Greatest, and there is no power nor might except with Allah, the Most High, the Most Great.

duas.transliterationEn: La ilaha illallahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamd, wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadeer. Subhanallah, walhamdulillah, wa la ilaha illallah, wallahu akbar, wa la hawla wa la quwwata illa billahil-'aliyyil-'azeem

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ بِاسْمِكَ أَحْيَا وَأَمُوتُ
duas.textEn: O Allah, by Your name I live and die.

translations.ar: O Allah, by Your name I live and die.
translations.en: O Allah, by Your name I live and die.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma bismika ahya wa amut

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ خَلَقْتَ نَفْسِي وَأَنْتَ تَوَفَّاهَا، لَكَ مَمَاتُهَا وَمَحْيَاهَا، إِنْ أَحْيَيْتَهَا فَاحْفَظْهَا، وَإِنْ أَمَتَّهَا فَاغْفِرْ لَهَا، اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَافِيَةَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, You created my soul and You take it back. To You belongs its death and its life. If You give it life, protect it, and if You cause it to die, forgive it. O Allah, I ask You for well-being.

translations.ar: O Allah, You created my soul and You take it back. To You belongs its death and its life. If You give it life, protect it, and if You cause it to die, forgive it. O Allah, I ask You for well-being.
translations.en: O Allah, You created my soul and You take it back. To You belongs its death and its life. If You give it life, protect it, and if You cause it to die, forgive it. O Allah, I ask You for well-being.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma khalaqta nafsi wa anta tawaffaha, laka mamatuha wa mahyaha, in ahyaytaha fahfazha, wa in amattaha faghfir laha, Allahumma inni as'alukal-'afiyah

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ أَسْلَمْتُ وَجْهِي إِلَيْكَ، وَفَوَّضْتُ أَمْرِي إِلَيْكَ، وَأَلْجَأْتُ ظَهْرِي إِلَيْكَ، رَغْبَةً وَرَهْبَةً إِلَيْكَ، لَا مَلْجَأَ وَلَا مَنْجَا مِنْكَ إِلَّا إِلَيْكَ، آمَنْتُ بِكِتَابِكَ الَّذِي أَنْزَلْتَ، وَنَبِيِّكَ الَّذِي أَرْسَلْتَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I submit my face to You, entrust my affairs to You, and lay my back depending upon You, hoping in You and fearing You. There is no refuge and no escape from You except to You. I believe in Your Book which You revealed and in Your Prophet whom You sent.

translations.ar: O Allah, I submit my face to You, entrust my affairs to You, and lay my back depending upon You, hoping in You and fearing You. There is no refuge and no escape from You except to You. I believe in Your Book which You revealed and in Your Prophet whom You sent.
translations.en: O Allah, I submit my face to You, entrust my affairs to You, and lay my back depending upon You, hoping in You and fearing You. There is no refuge and no escape from You except to You. I believe in Your Book which You revealed and in Your Prophet whom You sent.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma aslamtu wajhi ilayk, wa fawwadtu amri ilayk, wa alja'tu zahri ilayk, raghbatan wa rahbatan ilayk, la malja'a wa la manja minka illa ilayk, amantu bikitabikal-ladhi anzalt, wa nabiyyikal-ladhi arsalt

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ السَّمَاوَاتِ السَّبْعِ وَرَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ، رَبَّنَا وَرَبَّ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ، فَالِقَ الْحَبِّ وَالنَّوَى، مُنْزِلَ التَّوْرَاةِ وَالْإِنْجِيلِ وَالْقُرْآنِ، أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ كُلِّ ذِي شَرٍّ أَنْتَ آخِذٌ بِنَاصِيَتِهِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, Lord of the seven heavens and Lord of the Magnificent Throne, our Lord and Lord of everything, Splitter of the grain and the date-stone, Revealer of the Torah, the Gospel, and the Quran, I seek refuge in You from the evil of everything whose forelock is in Your grasp.

translations.ar: O Allah, Lord of the seven heavens and Lord of the Magnificent Throne, our Lord and Lord of everything, Splitter of the grain and the date-stone, Revealer of the Torah, the Gospel, and the Quran, I seek refuge in You from the evil of everything whose forelock is in Your grasp.
translations.en: O Allah, Lord of the seven heavens and Lord of the Magnificent Throne, our Lord and Lord of everything, Splitter of the grain and the date-stone, Revealer of the Torah, the Gospel, and the Quran, I seek refuge in You from the evil of everything whose forelock is in Your grasp.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma rabbas-samawatis-sab'i wa rabbal-'arshil-'azim, rabbana wa rabba kulli shay', faliqal-habbi wan-nawa, munzilat-tawrati wal-injili wal-Qur'an, a'udhu bika min sharri kulli dhi sharrin anta akhidhun binasiyatih

duas.textAr: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَطْعَمَنَا وَسَقَانَا، وَكَفَانَا وَآوَانَا، فَكَمْ مِمَّنْ لَا كَافِيَ لَهُ وَلَا مُؤْوِيَ
duas.textEn: All praise is due to Allah who fed us and gave us drink, and sufficed us and sheltered us. For how many have none to suffice them or shelter them.

translations.ar: All praise is due to Allah who fed us and gave us drink, and sufficed us and sheltered us. For how many have none to suffice them or shelter them.
translations.en: All praise is due to Allah who fed us and gave us drink, and sufficed us and sheltered us. For how many have none to suffice them or shelter them.

duas.transliterationEn: Alhamdulillahil-ladhi at'amana wa saqana, wa kafana wa awana, fakam mimman la kafiya lahu wa la mu'wiya

duas.textAr: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ الْوَاحِدُ الْقَهَّارُ، رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الْعَزِيزُ الْغَفَّارُ
duas.textEn: There is no deity but Allah, the One, the Prevailing. Lord of the heavens and the earth and all between them, the All-Mighty, the Oft-Forgiving.

translations.ar: There is no deity but Allah, the One, the Prevailing. Lord of the heavens and the earth and all between them, the All-Mighty, the Oft-Forgiving.
translations.en: There is no deity but Allah, the One, the Prevailing. Lord of the heavens and the earth and all between them, the All-Mighty, the Oft-Forgiving.

duas.transliterationEn: La ilaha illallahul-wahidul-qahhar, rabbus-samawati wal-ardi wa ma baynahumal-'azeezul-ghaffar

duas.textAr: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ
duas.textEn: All praise is for Allah. (If you see a good dream, praise Allah and share it only with those you love.)
duas.titleAr: ما يفعل من رأى رؤيا حسنة

translations.ar: All praise is for Allah. (If you see a good dream, praise Allah and share it only with those you love.)
translations.en: All praise is for Allah. (If you see a good dream, praise Allah and share it only with those you love.)

duas.transliterationEn: Alhamdulillah

duas.textAr: أَعُوذُ بِاللهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ
duas.textEn: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed devil. (Spit dryly three times to your left, turn to the other side, and do not tell anyone about it.)
duas.titleAr: ما يفعل من رأى حلماً مكروهاً

translations.ar: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed devil. (Spit dryly three times to your left, turn to the other side, and do not tell anyone about it.)
translations.en: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed devil. (Spit dryly three times to your left, turn to the other side, and do not tell anyone about it.)

duas.transliterationEn: A'udhu billahi minash-shaytanir-rajeem

duas.textAr: بِسْمِ اللهِ وَلَجْنَا، وَبِسْمِ اللهِ خَرَجْنَا، وَعَلَى اللهِ رَبِّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا
duas.textEn: In the name of Allah we enter, and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we depend.

translations.ar: In the name of Allah we enter, and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we depend.
translations.en: In the name of Allah we enter, and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we depend.

duas.transliterationEn: Bismillahi walajna, wa bismillahi kharajna, wa 'ala Allahi rabbina tawakkalna

duas.textAr: بِسْمِ اللهِ، تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللهِ، وَلَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللهِ
duas.textEn: In the name of Allah, I put my trust in Allah, and there is no power nor might except with Allah.

translations.ar: In the name of Allah, I put my trust in Allah, and there is no power nor might except with Allah.
translations.en: In the name of Allah, I put my trust in Allah, and there is no power nor might except with Allah.

duas.transliterationEn: Bismillah, tawakkaltu 'alallah, wa la hawla wa la quwwata illa billah

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ أَنْ أَضِلَّ، أَوْ أُضَلَّ، أَوْ أَزِلَّ، أَوْ أُزَلَّ، أَوْ أَظْلِمَ، أَوْ أُظْلَمَ، أَوْ أَجْهَلَ، أَوْ يُجْهَلَ عَلَيَّ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from going astray or being led astray, from slipping or being made to slip, from oppressing or being oppressed, and from acting ignorantly or being treated ignorantly.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from going astray or being led astray, from slipping or being made to slip, from oppressing or being oppressed, and from acting ignorantly or being treated ignorantly.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from going astray or being led astray, from slipping or being made to slip, from oppressing or being oppressed, and from acting ignorantly or being treated ignorantly.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika an adilla, aw udalla, aw azilla, aw uzalla, aw azlima, aw uzlama, aw ajhala, aw yujhala 'alayya

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ فِي بَيْتِي نُوراً، وَفِي قَلْبِي نُوراً، وَفِي بَصَرِي نُوراً، وَفِي سَمْعِي نُوراً
duas.textEn: O Allah, place light in my home, light in my heart, light in my sight, and light in my hearing.

translations.ar: O Allah, place light in my home, light in my heart, light in my sight, and light in my hearing.
translations.en: O Allah, place light in my home, light in my heart, light in my sight, and light in my hearing.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahummaj'al fi bayti nura, wa fi qalbi nura, wa fi basari nura, wa fi sam'i nura

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِي بَيْتِنَا
duas.textEn: O Allah, bless us in our home.

translations.ar: O Allah, bless us in our home.
translations.en: O Allah, bless us in our home.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma barik lana fi baytina

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ الْمَوْلِجِ وَخَيْرَ الْمَخْرَجِ، بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَلَجْنَا، وَبِسْمِ اللَّهِ خَرَجْنَا، وَعَلَى اللَّهِ رَبِّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا
duas.textEn: O Allah, I ask You for the best entry and the best exit. In the name of Allah we enter, and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon Allah our Lord we rely.

translations.ar: O Allah, I ask You for the best entry and the best exit. In the name of Allah we enter, and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon Allah our Lord we rely.
translations.en: O Allah, I ask You for the best entry and the best exit. In the name of Allah we enter, and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon Allah our Lord we rely.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni as'aluka khayral-mawlij wa khayral-makhraj, bismillahi walajna wa bismillahi kharajna wa 'alallahi rabbina tawakkalna

duas.textAr: أَعُوذُ بِاللهِ الْعَظِيمِ، وَبِوَجْهِهِ الْكَرِيمِ، وَسُلْطَانِهِ الْقَدِيمِ، مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ
duas.textEn: I seek refuge in Allah the Almighty, and in His noble Face, and in His eternal authority, from the accursed Satan.

translations.ar: I seek refuge in Allah the Almighty, and in His noble Face, and in His eternal authority, from the accursed Satan.
translations.en: I seek refuge in Allah the Almighty, and in His noble Face, and in His eternal authority, from the accursed Satan.

duas.transliterationEn: A'udhu billahil-'azeem, wa biwajhihil-kareem, wa sultanihil-qadeem, minash-shaytanir-rajeem

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ افْتَحْ لِي أَبْوَابَ رَحْمَتِكَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, open for me the doors of Your mercy.

translations.ar: O Allah, open for me the doors of Your mercy.
translations.en: O Allah, open for me the doors of Your mercy.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma-ftah li abwaba rahmatik

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I ask You from Your bounty.

translations.ar: O Allah, I ask You from Your bounty.
translations.en: O Allah, I ask You from Your bounty.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni as'aluka min fadlik

duas.textAr: بِسْمِ اللهِ، وَالصَّلَاةُ وَالسَّلَامُ عَلَى رَسُولِ اللهِ، اللَّهُمَّ افْتَحْ لِي أَبْوَابَ رَحْمَتِكَ
duas.textEn: In the name of Allah, and peace and blessings be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, open for me the doors of Your mercy.

translations.ar: In the name of Allah, and peace and blessings be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, open for me the doors of Your mercy.
translations.en: In the name of Allah, and peace and blessings be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, open for me the doors of Your mercy.

duas.transliterationEn: Bismillah, was-salatu was-salamu 'ala rasulillah, Allahumma-ftah li abwaba rahmatik

duas.textAr: بِسْمِ اللهِ، وَالصَّلَاةُ وَالسَّلَامُ عَلَى رَسُولِ اللهِ، اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ، اللَّهُمَّ اعْصِمْنِي مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ
duas.textEn: In the name of Allah, and peace and blessings be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, I ask You from Your bounty. O Allah, protect me from the accursed Satan.
duas.titleAr: الدعاء الكامل عند الخروج من المسجد

translations.ar: In the name of Allah, and peace and blessings be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, I ask You from Your bounty. O Allah, protect me from the accursed Satan.
translations.en: In the name of Allah, and peace and blessings be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, I ask You from Your bounty. O Allah, protect me from the accursed Satan.

duas.transliterationEn: Bismillah, was-salatu was-salamu 'ala rasulillah, Allahumma inni as'aluka min fadlik, Allahumma'simni minash-shaytanir-rajeem

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ هَذِهِ الدَّعْوَةِ التَّامَّةِ، وَالصَّلَاةِ الْقَائِمَةِ، آتِ مُحَمَّداً الْوَسِيلَةَ وَالْفَضِيلَةَ، وَابْعَثْهُ مَقَاماً مَحْمُوداً الَّذِي وَعَدْتَهُ
duas.textEn: O Allah, Lord of this perfect call and the prayer to be established, grant Muhammad the intercession and the honor, and raise him to the praised station which You have promised him.

translations.ar: O Allah, Lord of this perfect call and the prayer to be established, grant Muhammad the intercession and the honor, and raise him to the praised station which You have promised him.
translations.en: O Allah, Lord of this perfect call and the prayer to be established, grant Muhammad the intercession and the honor, and raise him to the praised station which You have promised him.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma rabba hadhihid-da'watit-tammah, was-salatil-qa'imah, ati Muhammadanil-waseelata wal-fadeelah, wab'athhu maqamam mahmoodanil-ladhi wa'adtah

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ فِي قَلْبِي نُوراً، وَفِي لِسَانِي نُوراً، وَفِي سَمْعِي نُوراً، وَفِي بَصَرِي نُوراً، وَمِنْ فَوْقِي نُوراً، وَمِنْ تَحْتِي نُوراً، وَعَنْ يَمِينِي نُوراً، وَعَنْ شِمَالِي نُوراً، وَمِنْ أَمَامِي نُوراً، وَمِنْ خَلْفِي نُوراً، وَاجْعَلْ لِي نُوراً
duas.textEn: O Allah, place light in my heart, light on my tongue, light in my hearing, light in my sight, light above me, light below me, light to my right, light to my left, light in front of me, light behind me, and grant me light.

translations.ar: O Allah, place light in my heart, light on my tongue, light in my hearing, light in my sight, light above me, light below me, light to my right, light to my left, light in front of me, light behind me, and grant me light.
translations.en: O Allah, place light in my heart, light on my tongue, light in my hearing, light in my sight, light above me, light below me, light to my right, light to my left, light in front of me, light behind me, and grant me light.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahummaj'al fi qalbi noora, wa fi lisani noora, wa fi sam'i noora, wa fi basari noora, wa min fawqi noora, wa min tahti noora, wa 'an yameeni noora, wa 'an shimali noora, wa min amami noora, wa min khalfi noora, waj'al li noora

duas.textAr: بِسْمِ اللهِ
duas.textEn: In the name of Allah.

translations.ar: In the name of Allah.
translations.en: In the name of Allah.

duas.transliterationEn: Bismillah

duas.textAr: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَطْعَمَنِي هَذَا، وَرَزَقَنِيهِ مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّي وَلَا قُوَّةٍ
duas.textEn: All praise is due to Allah who fed me this and provided it for me without any power or might from myself.

translations.ar: All praise is due to Allah who fed me this and provided it for me without any power or might from myself.
translations.en: All praise is due to Allah who fed me this and provided it for me without any power or might from myself.

duas.transliterationEn: Alhamdulillahil-ladhi at'amani hadha, wa razaqanihi min ghayri hawlin minni wa la quwwah

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِيهِ وَأَطْعِمْنَا خَيْراً مِنْهُ
duas.textEn: O Allah, bless it for us and feed us better than it.

translations.ar: O Allah, bless it for us and feed us better than it.
translations.en: O Allah, bless it for us and feed us better than it.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma barik lana fihi wa at'imna khayran minh

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ أَطْعِمْ مَنْ أَطْعَمَنِي، وَاسْقِ مَنْ سَقَانِي
duas.textEn: O Allah, feed him who fed me, and give drink to him who gave me drink.

translations.ar: O Allah, feed him who fed me, and give drink to him who gave me drink.
translations.en: O Allah, feed him who fed me, and give drink to him who gave me drink.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma at'im man at'amani, wasqi man saqani

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَهُمْ فِي مَا رَزَقْتَهُمْ، وَاغْفِرْ لَهُمْ وَارْحَمْهُمْ
duas.textEn: O Allah, bless them in what You have provided for them, and forgive them and have mercy upon them.
duas.titleEn: For the One Who Provides Food

titleTranslations.en: For the One Who Provides Food

translations.ar: O Allah, bless them in what You have provided for them, and forgive them and have mercy upon them.
translations.en: O Allah, bless them in what You have provided for them, and forgive them and have mercy upon them.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma barik lahum fi ma razaqtahum, waghfir lahum warhamhum

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِيهِ وَزِدْنَا مِنْهُ
duas.textEn: O Allah, bless it for us and give us more of it.

translations.ar: O Allah, bless it for us and give us more of it.
translations.en: O Allah, bless it for us and give us more of it.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma barik lana fihi wa zidna minh

duas.textAr: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ حَمْدًا كَثِيرًا طَيِّبًا مُبَارَكًا فِيهِ، غَيْرَ مَكْفِيٍّ وَلَا مُوَدَّعٍ وَلَا مُسْتَغْنًى عَنْهُ رَبَّنَا
duas.textEn: All praise is due to Allah, an abundant, pure, and blessed praise. We cannot suffice, nor bid farewell, nor be independent of our Lord.

translations.ar: All praise is due to Allah, an abundant, pure, and blessed praise. We cannot suffice, nor bid farewell, nor be independent of our Lord.
translations.en: All praise is due to Allah, an abundant, pure, and blessed praise. We cannot suffice, nor bid farewell, nor be independent of our Lord.

duas.transliterationEn: Alhamdulillahi hamdan kathiran tayyiban mubarakan fih, ghayra makfiyyin wa la muwadda'in wa la mustaghnan 'anhu rabbana

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِي طَعَامِنَا، وَأَطْعِمْنَا خَيْرًا مِنْهُ
duas.textEn: O Allah, bless us in our food and feed us better than it.

translations.ar: O Allah, bless us in our food and feed us better than it.
translations.en: O Allah, bless us in our food and feed us better than it.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma barik lana fi ta'amina wa at'imna khayran minh

duas.textAr: أَفْطَرَ عِنْدَكُمُ الصَّائِمُونَ، وَأَكَلَ طَعَامَكُمُ الْأَبْرَارُ، وَصَلَّتْ عَلَيْكُمُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ
duas.textEn: May the fasting break their fast with you, may the righteous eat your food, and may the angels send prayers upon you.

translations.ar: May the fasting break their fast with you, may the righteous eat your food, and may the angels send prayers upon you.
translations.en: May the fasting break their fast with you, may the righteous eat your food, and may the angels send prayers upon you.

duas.transliterationEn: Aftara 'indakumus-sa'imun, wa akala ta'amakumul-abrar, wa sallat 'alaykumul-mala'ikah

duas.textAr: بِسْمِ اللهِ أَوَّلَهُ وَآخِرَهُ
duas.textEn: In the name of Allah, at the beginning and the end of it.

translations.ar: In the name of Allah, at the beginning and the end of it.
translations.en: In the name of Allah, at the beginning and the end of it.

duas.transliterationEn: Bismillahi awwalahu wa akhirah

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِي ثَمَرِنَا، وَبَارِكْ لَنَا فِي مَدِينَتِنَا، وَبَارِكْ لَنَا فِي صَاعِنَا، وَبَارِكْ لَنَا فِي مُدِّنَا
duas.textEn: O Allah, bless us in our fruit, bless us in our city, bless us in our sa' (measure), and bless us in our mudd (measure).
duas.titleEn: Upon Seeing First Fruit of Season

titleTranslations.en: Upon Seeing First Fruit of Season

translations.ar: O Allah, bless us in our fruit, bless us in our city, bless us in our sa' (measure), and bless us in our mudd (measure).
translations.en: O Allah, bless us in our fruit, bless us in our city, bless us in our sa' (measure), and bless us in our mudd (measure).

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma barik lana fi thamarina, wa barik lana fi madinatina, wa barik lana fi sa'ina, wa barik lana fi muddina

duas.textAr: سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ، وَتَبَارَكَ اسْمُكَ، وَتَعَالَى جَدُّكَ، وَلَا إِلَهَ غَيْرُكَ
duas.textEn: Glory be to You, O Allah, and praise. Blessed is Your name, and exalted is Your majesty. There is no deity except You.

translations.ar: Glory be to You, O Allah, and praise. Blessed is Your name, and exalted is Your majesty. There is no deity except You.
translations.en: Glory be to You, O Allah, and praise. Blessed is Your name, and exalted is Your majesty. There is no deity except You.

duas.transliterationEn: Subhanakallahumma wa bihamdik, wa tabarakasmuk, wa ta'ala jadduk, wa la ilaha ghayruk

duas.textAr: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي، رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي
duas.textEn: My Lord, forgive me. My Lord, forgive me.

translations.ar: My Lord, forgive me. My Lord, forgive me.
translations.en: My Lord, forgive me. My Lord, forgive me.

duas.transliterationEn: Rabbighfir li, Rabbighfir li

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اهْدِنِي فِيمَنْ هَدَيْتَ، وَعَافِنِي فِيمَنْ عَافَيْتَ، وَتَوَلَّنِي فِيمَنْ تَوَلَّيْتَ، وَبَارِكْ لِي فِيمَا أَعْطَيْتَ، وَقِنِي شَرَّ مَا قَضَيْتَ، فَإِنَّكَ تَقْضِي وَلَا يُقْضَى عَلَيْكَ، إِنَّهُ لَا يَذِلُّ مَنْ وَالَيْتَ، وَلَا يَعِزُّ مَنْ عَادَيْتَ، تَبَارَكْتَ رَبَّنَا وَتَعَالَيْتَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, guide me among those You have guided, pardon me among those You have pardoned, turn to me in friendship among those to whom You have turned in friendship, and bless me in what You have bestowed. Protect me from the evil of what You have decreed, for You decree and none decrees against You. Truly, he whom You befriend is not humiliated, and he whom You oppose is not honored. Blessed are You, our Lord, and Exalted.

translations.ar: O Allah, guide me among those You have guided, pardon me among those You have pardoned, turn to me in friendship among those to whom You have turned in friendship, and bless me in what You have bestowed. Protect me from the evil of what You have decreed, for You decree and none decrees against You. Truly, he whom You befriend is not humiliated, and he whom You oppose is not honored. Blessed are You, our Lord, and Exalted.
translations.en: O Allah, guide me among those You have guided, pardon me among those You have pardoned, turn to me in friendship among those to whom You have turned in friendship, and bless me in what You have bestowed. Protect me from the evil of what You have decreed, for You decree and none decrees against You. Truly, he whom You befriend is not humiliated, and he whom You oppose is not honored. Blessed are You, our Lord, and Exalted.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma-hdini feeman hadayt, wa 'afini feeman 'afayt, wa tawallani feeman tawallayt, wa barik li feema a'tayt, wa qini sharra ma qadayt, fa-innaka taqdi wa la yuqda 'alayk, innahu la yadhillu man walayt, wa la ya'izzu man 'adayt, tabarakta rabbana wa ta'alayt

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ، وَمِنْ عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ، وَمِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَحْيَا وَالْمَمَاتِ، وَمِنْ شَرِّ فِتْنَةِ الْمَسِيحِ الدَّجَّالِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, from the punishment of Hellfire, from the trials of life and death, and from the evil of the trial of the False Messiah.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, from the punishment of Hellfire, from the trials of life and death, and from the evil of the trial of the False Messiah.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, from the punishment of Hellfire, from the trials of life and death, and from the evil of the trial of the False Messiah.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min 'adhabil-qabr, wa min 'adhabi jahannam, wa min fitnatil-mahya wal-mamat, wa min sharri fitnatil-masihid-dajjal

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي مَا قَدَّمْتُ وَمَا أَخَّرْتُ، وَمَا أَسْرَرْتُ وَمَا أَعْلَنْتُ، وَمَا أَسْرَفْتُ، وَمَا أَنْتَ أَعْلَمُ بِهِ مِنِّي، أَنْتَ الْمُقَدِّمُ وَأَنْتَ الْمُؤَخِّرُ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, forgive me what I have done in the past and what I will do in the future, what I have concealed and what I have done openly, what I have exceeded, and what You know better than I. You are the One who brings forward and the One who puts back. There is no deity except You.

translations.ar: O Allah, forgive me what I have done in the past and what I will do in the future, what I have concealed and what I have done openly, what I have exceeded, and what You know better than I. You are the One who brings forward and the One who puts back. There is no deity except You.
translations.en: O Allah, forgive me what I have done in the past and what I will do in the future, what I have concealed and what I have done openly, what I have exceeded, and what You know better than I. You are the One who brings forward and the One who puts back. There is no deity except You.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahummaghfir li ma qaddamtu wa ma akhkhart, wa ma asrartu wa ma a'lant, wa ma asraft, wa ma anta a'lamu bihi minni, antal-muqaddimu wa antal-mu'akhkhir, la ilaha illa ant

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ، وَمِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ، وَمِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَحْيَا وَالْمَمَاتِ، وَمِنْ شَرِّ فِتْنَةِ الْمَسِيحِ الدَّجَّالِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of Hell, from the punishment of the grave, from the trials of life and death, and from the evil of the trial of the False Messiah.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of Hell, from the punishment of the grave, from the trials of life and death, and from the evil of the trial of the False Messiah.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of Hell, from the punishment of the grave, from the trials of life and death, and from the evil of the trial of the False Messiah.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min 'adhabi jahannam, wa min 'adhabil-qabr, wa min fitnatil-mahya wal-mamat, wa min sharri fitnatil-masihid-dajjal

duas.textAr: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَارْحَمْنِي وَاهْدِنِي وَعَافِنِي وَارْزُقْنِي
duas.textEn: My Lord, forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, grant me health, and provide for me.

translations.ar: My Lord, forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, grant me health, and provide for me.
translations.en: My Lord, forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, grant me health, and provide for me.

duas.transliterationEn: Rabbighfir li warhamni wahdini wa 'afini warzuqni

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ سَجَدْتُ، وَبِكَ آمَنْتُ، وَلَكَ أَسْلَمْتُ، سَجَدَ وَجْهِي لِلَّذِي خَلَقَهُ وَصَوَّرَهُ، وَشَقَّ سَمْعَهُ وَبَصَرَهُ، تَبَارَكَ اللَّهُ أَحْسَنُ الْخَالِقِينَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, unto You I have prostrated, in You I have believed, and to You I have submitted. My face has prostrated to the One who created it and shaped it, and brought forth its hearing and sight. Blessed is Allah, the Best of Creators.

translations.ar: O Allah, unto You I have prostrated, in You I have believed, and to You I have submitted. My face has prostrated to the One who created it and shaped it, and brought forth its hearing and sight. Blessed is Allah, the Best of Creators.
translations.en: O Allah, unto You I have prostrated, in You I have believed, and to You I have submitted. My face has prostrated to the One who created it and shaped it, and brought forth its hearing and sight. Blessed is Allah, the Best of Creators.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma laka sajadt, wa bika amant, wa laka aslamt, sajada wajhi lilladhi khalaqahu wa sawwarahu, wa shaqqa sam'ahu wa basarah, tabarakallahu ahsanul-khaliqin

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِرِضَاكَ مِنْ سَخَطِكَ، وَبِمُعَافَاتِكَ مِنْ عُقُوبَتِكَ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْكَ، لَا أُحْصِي ثَنَاءً عَلَيْكَ أَنْتَ كَمَا أَثْنَيْتَ عَلَى نَفْسِكَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in Your pleasure from Your wrath, in Your forgiveness from Your punishment. I seek refuge in You from You. I cannot count Your praises; You are as You have praised Yourself.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek refuge in Your pleasure from Your wrath, in Your forgiveness from Your punishment. I seek refuge in You from You. I cannot count Your praises; You are as You have praised Yourself.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek refuge in Your pleasure from Your wrath, in Your forgiveness from Your punishment. I seek refuge in You from You. I cannot count Your praises; You are as You have praised Yourself.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu biridaka min sakhatik, wa bimu'afatika min 'uqubatik, wa a'udhu bika mink, la uhsi thana'an 'alayk, anta kama athnayta 'ala nafsik

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ رَكَعْتُ، وَبِكَ آمَنْتُ، وَلَكَ أَسْلَمْتُ، خَشَعَ لَكَ سَمْعِي، وَبَصَرِي، وَمُخِّي، وَعَظْمِي، وَعَصَبِي
duas.textEn: O Allah, unto You I have bowed, in You I have believed, and to You I have submitted. My hearing, my sight, my brain, my bones, and my nerves are humbled before You.

translations.ar: O Allah, unto You I have bowed, in You I have believed, and to You I have submitted. My hearing, my sight, my brain, my bones, and my nerves are humbled before You.
translations.en: O Allah, unto You I have bowed, in You I have believed, and to You I have submitted. My hearing, my sight, my brain, my bones, and my nerves are humbled before You.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma laka raka'tu, wa bika amantu, wa laka aslamtu, khasha'a laka sam'i wa basari wa mukhkhi wa 'azmi wa 'asabi

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي، وَارْحَمْنِي، وَاهْدِنِي، وَاجْبُرْنِي، وَعَافِنِي، وَارْزُقْنِي، وَارْفَعْنِي
duas.textEn: O Allah, forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, support me, grant me health, provide for me, and elevate me.

translations.ar: O Allah, forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, support me, grant me health, provide for me, and elevate me.
translations.en: O Allah, forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, support me, grant me health, provide for me, and elevate me.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahummaghfir li, warhamni, wahdini, wajburni, wa 'afini, warzuqni, warfa'ni

duas.textAr: سَمِعَ اللهُ لِمَنْ حَمِدَهُ، رَبَّنَا وَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ حَمْداً كَثِيراً طَيِّباً مُبَارَكاً فِيهِ
duas.textEn: Allah hears those who praise Him. Our Lord, to You is all praise, abundant good blessed praise.

translations.ar: Allah hears those who praise Him. Our Lord, to You is all praise, abundant good blessed praise.
translations.en: Allah hears those who praise Him. Our Lord, to You is all praise, abundant good blessed praise.

duas.transliterationEn: Sami'allahu liman hamidah. Rabbana wa lakal-hamd, hamdan katheeran tayyiban mubarakan feeh

duas.textAr: التَّحِيَّاتُ لِلَّهِ وَالصَّلَوَاتُ وَالطَّيِّبَاتُ، السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ وَرَحْمَةُ اللهِ وَبَرَكَاتُهُ، السَّلَامُ عَلَيْنَا وَعَلَى عِبَادِ اللهِ الصَّالِحِينَ. أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَأَشْهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُولُهُ
duas.textEn: Greetings, prayers, and pure words are for Allah. Peace be upon you, O Prophet, and the mercy of Allah and His blessings. Peace be upon us and upon the righteous servants of Allah. I bear witness that there is no deity but Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and His Messenger.

translations.ar: Greetings, prayers, and pure words are for Allah. Peace be upon you, O Prophet, and the mercy of Allah and His blessings. Peace be upon us and upon the righteous servants of Allah. I bear witness that there is no deity but Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and His Messenger.
translations.en: Greetings, prayers, and pure words are for Allah. Peace be upon you, O Prophet, and the mercy of Allah and His blessings. Peace be upon us and upon the righteous servants of Allah. I bear witness that there is no deity but Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and His Messenger.

duas.transliterationEn: At-tahiyyatu lillahi was-salawatu wat-tayyibat. As-salamu 'alayka ayyuhan-nabiyyu wa rahmatullahi wa barakatuh. As-salamu 'alayna wa 'ala 'ibadillahis-saliheen. Ashhadu an la ilaha illallah wa ashhadu anna Muhammadan 'abduhu wa rasuluh

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، كَمَا صَلَّيْتَ عَلَى إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَى آلِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ، إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ. اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، كَمَا بَارَكْتَ عَلَى إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَى آلِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ، إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ
duas.textEn: O Allah, send prayers upon Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, as You sent prayers upon Ibrahim and the family of Ibrahim. You are Praiseworthy, Glorious. O Allah, bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad as You blessed Ibrahim and the family of Ibrahim. You are Praiseworthy, Glorious.

translations.ar: O Allah, send prayers upon Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, as You sent prayers upon Ibrahim and the family of Ibrahim. You are Praiseworthy, Glorious. O Allah, bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad as You blessed Ibrahim and the family of Ibrahim. You are Praiseworthy, Glorious.
translations.en: O Allah, send prayers upon Muhammad and the family of Muhammad, as You sent prayers upon Ibrahim and the family of Ibrahim. You are Praiseworthy, Glorious. O Allah, bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad as You blessed Ibrahim and the family of Ibrahim. You are Praiseworthy, Glorious.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammad wa 'ala ali Muhammad, kama sallayta 'ala Ibrahim wa 'ala ali Ibrahim, innaka hameedun majeed. Allahumma barik 'ala Muhammad wa 'ala ali Muhammad, kama barakta 'ala Ibrahim wa 'ala ali Ibrahim, innaka hameedun majeed

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ، وَمِنْ عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ، وَمِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَحْيَا وَالْمَمَاتِ، وَمِنْ شَرِّ فِتْنَةِ الْمَسِيحِ الدَّجَّالِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, from the punishment of Hell, from the trials of life and death, and from the evil of the trial of the False Messiah.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, from the punishment of Hell, from the trials of life and death, and from the evil of the trial of the False Messiah.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, from the punishment of Hell, from the trials of life and death, and from the evil of the trial of the False Messiah.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min 'adhabil-qabr, wa min 'adhabi jahannam, wa min fitnatil-mahya wal-mamat, wa min sharri fitnatil-masihid-dajjal

duas.textAr: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللهَ، أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللهَ، أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللهَ. اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ السَّلَامُ وَمِنْكَ السَّلَامُ، تَبَارَكْتَ يَا ذَا الْجَلَالِ وَالْإِكْرَامِ
duas.textEn: I seek Allah's forgiveness (three times). O Allah, You are Peace, and from You is peace. Blessed are You, O Possessor of Majesty and Honor.

translations.ar: I seek Allah's forgiveness (three times). O Allah, You are Peace, and from You is peace. Blessed are You, O Possessor of Majesty and Honor.
translations.en: I seek Allah's forgiveness (three times). O Allah, You are Peace, and from You is peace. Blessed are You, O Possessor of Majesty and Honor.

duas.transliterationEn: Astaghfirullah, astaghfirullah, astaghfirullah. Allahumma antas-salam wa minkas-salam, tabarakta ya dhal-jalali wal-ikram

duas.textAr: سُبْحَانَ اللهِ (٣٣)، الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ (٣٣)، اللهُ أَكْبَرُ (٣٣)، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
duas.textEn: Glory be to Allah (33 times), All praise is for Allah (33 times), Allah is the Greatest (33 times), There is no deity but Allah alone without partner. To Him belongs the dominion and praise, and He is over all things Omnipotent.

translations.ar: Glory be to Allah (33 times), All praise is for Allah (33 times), Allah is the Greatest (33 times), There is no deity but Allah alone without partner. To Him belongs the dominion and praise, and He is over all things Omnipotent.
translations.en: Glory be to Allah (33 times), All praise is for Allah (33 times), Allah is the Greatest (33 times), There is no deity but Allah alone without partner. To Him belongs the dominion and praise, and He is over all things Omnipotent.

duas.transliterationEn: SubhanAllah (33), Alhamdulillah (33), Allahu Akbar (33). La ilaha illallahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadeer

duas.textAr: اللهُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ لَا تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلَا نَوْمٌ لَهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ مَنْ ذَا الَّذِي يَشْفَعُ عِنْدَهُ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِهِ يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيْءٍ مِنْ عِلْمِهِ إِلَّا بِمَا شَاءَ وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَلَا يَئُودُهُ حِفْظُهُمَا وَهُوَ الْعَلِيُّ الْعَظِيمُ
duas.textEn: Allah! There is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Self-Sustaining. Neither drowsiness overtakes Him nor sleep. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is it that can intercede with Him except by His permission? He knows what is before them and what will be after them, and they encompass not a thing of His knowledge except for what He wills. His Throne extends over the heavens and the earth, and their preservation tires Him not. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.

translations.ar: Allah! There is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Self-Sustaining. Neither drowsiness overtakes Him nor sleep. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is it that can intercede with Him except by His permission? He knows what is before them and what will be after them, and they encompass not a thing of His knowledge except for what He wills. His Throne extends over the heavens and the earth, and their preservation tires Him not. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.
translations.en: Allah! There is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Self-Sustaining. Neither drowsiness overtakes Him nor sleep. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is it that can intercede with Him except by His permission? He knows what is before them and what will be after them, and they encompass not a thing of His knowledge except for what He wills. His Throne extends over the heavens and the earth, and their preservation tires Him not. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahu la ilaha illa huwal-hayyul-qayyum. La ta'khudhuhu sinatun wa la nawm. Lahu ma fis-samawati wa ma fil-ard. Man dhalladhi yashfa'u 'indahu illa bi idhnih. Ya'lamu ma bayna aydeehim wa ma khalfahum. Wa la yuheetuna bi shay'in min 'ilmihi illa bima sha'. Wasi'a kursiyyuhus-samawati wal-ard. Wa la ya'uduhu hifdhuhuma wa huwal-'aliyyul-'adheem

duas.textAr: سَجَدَ وَجْهِيَ لِلَّذِي خَلَقَهُ، وَشَقَّ سَمْعَهُ وَبَصَرَهُ، بِحَوْلِهِ وَقُوَّتِهِ، فَتَبَارَكَ اللهُ أَحْسَنُ الْخَالِقِينَ
duas.textEn: My face has prostrated to the One Who created it, and opened its hearing and sight by His might and power. Blessed is Allah, the Best of creators.

translations.ar: My face has prostrated to the One Who created it, and opened its hearing and sight by His might and power. Blessed is Allah, the Best of creators.
translations.en: My face has prostrated to the One Who created it, and opened its hearing and sight by His might and power. Blessed is Allah, the Best of creators.

duas.transliterationEn: Sajada wajhi lilladhi khalaqahu, wa shaqqa sam'ahu wa basarahu, bihawlihi wa quwwatih. Fatabarakallahu ahsanul-khaliqeen

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ صَيِّباً نَافِعاً
duas.textEn: O Allah, let it be a beneficial rain.

translations.ar: O Allah, let it be a beneficial rain.
translations.en: O Allah, let it be a beneficial rain.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma sayyiban nafi'a

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ حَوَالَيْنَا وَلَا عَلَيْنَا، اللَّهُمَّ عَلَى الْآكَامِ وَالظِّرَابِ وَبُطُونِ الْأَوْدِيَةِ وَمَنَابِتِ الشَّجَرِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, around us and not upon us. O Allah, upon the hills, the mountains, the valleys, and the places where trees grow.

translations.ar: O Allah, around us and not upon us. O Allah, upon the hills, the mountains, the valleys, and the places where trees grow.
translations.en: O Allah, around us and not upon us. O Allah, upon the hills, the mountains, the valleys, and the places where trees grow.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma hawalayna wa la 'alayna, Allahumma 'alal-akami waz-zirabi wa butoonil-awdiyati wa manabatish-shajar

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَهَا وَخَيْرَ مَا فِيهَا وَخَيْرَ مَا أُرْسِلَتْ بِهِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهَا وَشَرِّ مَا فِيهَا وَشَرِّ مَا أُرْسِلَتْ بِهِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I ask You for its good, the good it brings, and the good it was sent with. I seek refuge in You from its evil, the evil it brings, and the evil it was sent with.

translations.ar: O Allah, I ask You for its good, the good it brings, and the good it was sent with. I seek refuge in You from its evil, the evil it brings, and the evil it was sent with.
translations.en: O Allah, I ask You for its good, the good it brings, and the good it was sent with. I seek refuge in You from its evil, the evil it brings, and the evil it was sent with.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni as'aluka khayraha wa khayra ma fiha wa khayra ma ursilat bih, wa a'udhu bika min sharriha wa sharri ma fiha wa sharri ma ursilat bih

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ أَهِلَّهُ عَلَيْنَا بِالْأَمْنِ وَالْإِيمَانِ، وَالسَّلَامَةِ وَالْإِسْلَامِ، وَالتَّوْفِيقِ لِمَا تُحِبُّ وَتَرْضَى، رَبُّنَا وَرَبُّكَ اللَّهُ
duas.textEn: O Allah, let this moon appear on us with security and faith, with safety and Islam, and with success in what You love and are pleased with. Our Lord and your Lord is Allah.

translations.ar: O Allah, let this moon appear on us with security and faith, with safety and Islam, and with success in what You love and are pleased with. Our Lord and your Lord is Allah.
translations.en: O Allah, let this moon appear on us with security and faith, with safety and Islam, and with success in what You love and are pleased with. Our Lord and your Lord is Allah.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma ahillahu 'alayna bil-amni wal-iman, was-salamati wal-islam, wat-tawfeeqi lima tuhibbu wa tarda, rabbuna wa rabbukallah

duas.textAr: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي يُسَبِّحُ الرَّعْدُ بِحَمْدِهِ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ مِنْ خِيفَتِهِ
duas.textEn: Glory be to Him Whom the thunder glorifies with His praise, and the angels out of awe of Him.

translations.ar: Glory be to Him Whom the thunder glorifies with His praise, and the angels out of awe of Him.
translations.en: Glory be to Him Whom the thunder glorifies with His praise, and the angels out of awe of Him.

duas.transliterationEn: Subhanal-ladhi yusabbihur-ra'du bihamdihi wal-mala'ikatu min kheefatih

duas.textAr: مُطِرْنَا بِفَضْلِ اللهِ وَرَحْمَتِهِ
duas.textEn: We have been given rain by the grace and mercy of Allah.

translations.ar: We have been given rain by the grace and mercy of Allah.
translations.en: We have been given rain by the grace and mercy of Allah.

duas.transliterationEn: Mutirna bifadlillahi wa rahmatih

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اسْقِنَا غَيْثاً مُغِيثاً مَرِيئاً مَرِيعاً، نَافِعاً غَيْرَ ضَارٍّ، عَاجِلاً غَيْرَ آجِلٍ
duas.textEn: O Allah, provide us with rain that is life-giving, wholesome, fertile, beneficial and not harmful, immediate and not delayed.

translations.ar: O Allah, provide us with rain that is life-giving, wholesome, fertile, beneficial and not harmful, immediate and not delayed.
translations.en: O Allah, provide us with rain that is life-giving, wholesome, fertile, beneficial and not harmful, immediate and not delayed.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma-sqina ghaythan mugheethan maree'an maree'an, nafi'an ghayra darr, 'ajilan ghayra ajil

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ حَوَالَيْنَا وَلَا عَلَيْنَا، اللَّهُمَّ عَلَى الْآكَامِ وَالظِّرَابِ وَبُطُونِ الْأَوْدِيَةِ وَمَنَابِتِ الشَّجَرِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, let it rain around us and not upon us. O Allah, upon the hills, the mounds, the valleys, and where the trees grow.

translations.ar: O Allah, let it rain around us and not upon us. O Allah, upon the hills, the mounds, the valleys, and where the trees grow.
translations.en: O Allah, let it rain around us and not upon us. O Allah, upon the hills, the mounds, the valleys, and where the trees grow.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma hawalayna wa la 'alayna. Allahumma 'alal-akami wadh-dhirabi wa butoonil-awdiyati wa manabiti-sh-shajar

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْخُبُثِ وَالْخَبَائِثِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the male and female evil spirits.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the male and female evil spirits.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the male and female evil spirits.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-khubthi wal-khaba'ith

duas.textAr: غُفْرَانَكَ
duas.textEn: I seek Your forgiveness.

translations.ar: I seek Your forgiveness.
translations.en: I seek Your forgiveness.

duas.transliterationEn: Ghufranaka

duas.textAr: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي كَسَانِي هَذَا الثَّوْبَ وَرَزَقَنِيهِ مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّي وَلَا قُوَّةٍ
duas.textEn: All praise is due to Allah who clothed me with this garment and provided it for me without any power or might from myself.

translations.ar: All praise is due to Allah who clothed me with this garment and provided it for me without any power or might from myself.
translations.en: All praise is due to Allah who clothed me with this garment and provided it for me without any power or might from myself.

duas.transliterationEn: Alhamdulillahil-ladhi kasani hadha-th-thawba wa razaqanihi min ghayri hawlin minni wa la quwwah

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ هَذَا الْيَوْمِ: فَتْحَهُ، وَنَصْرَهُ، وَنُورَهُ، وَبَرَكَتَهُ، وَهُدَاهُ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا فِيهِ وَشَرِّ مَا بَعْدَهُ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I ask You for the good of this day: its triumph, its victory, its light, its blessing, and its guidance. I seek refuge in You from the evil in it and the evil after it.
duas.titleEn: At the Start of the Day

titleTranslations.en: At the Start of the Day

translations.ar: O Allah, I ask You for the good of this day: its triumph, its victory, its light, its blessing, and its guidance. I seek refuge in You from the evil in it and the evil after it.
translations.en: O Allah, I ask You for the good of this day: its triumph, its victory, its light, its blessing, and its guidance. I seek refuge in You from the evil in it and the evil after it.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni as'aluka khayra hadhal-yawm: fat-hahu, wa nasrahu, wa noorahu, wa barakatahu, wa hudahu, wa a'udhu bika min sharri ma fihi wa sharri ma ba'dah

duas.textAr: أَعُوذُ بِاللهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ
duas.textEn: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed Satan.

translations.ar: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed Satan.
translations.en: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed Satan.

duas.transliterationEn: A'udhu billahi minash-shaytanir-rajeem

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ كَسَوْتَنِيهِ، أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَهُ وَخَيْرَ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهِ وَشَرِّ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ
duas.textEn: O Allah, all praise is for You. You have clothed me with it. I ask You for its good and the good for which it was made, and I seek refuge in You from its evil and the evil for which it was made.

translations.ar: O Allah, all praise is for You. You have clothed me with it. I ask You for its good and the good for which it was made, and I seek refuge in You from its evil and the evil for which it was made.
translations.en: O Allah, all praise is for You. You have clothed me with it. I ask You for its good and the good for which it was made, and I seek refuge in You from its evil and the evil for which it was made.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma lakal-hamdu anta kasawtaneehi, as'aluka khayrahu wa khayra ma suni'a lah, wa a'udhu bika min sharrihi wa sharri ma suni'a lah

duas.textAr: الْبَسْ جَدِيداً، وَعِشْ حَمِيداً، وَمُتْ شَهِيداً
duas.textEn: Wear new garments, live a praiseworthy life, and die as a martyr.
duas.titleEn: Supplication for Someone Wearing New Clothes

titleTranslations.en: Supplication for Someone Wearing New Clothes

translations.ar: Wear new garments, live a praiseworthy life, and die as a martyr.
translations.en: Wear new garments, live a praiseworthy life, and die as a martyr.

duas.transliterationEn: Ilbas jadeedan, wa 'ish hameedan, wa mut shaheedan

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا عَمِلْتُ، وَمِنْ شَرِّ مَا لَمْ أَعْمَلْ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done and from the evil of what I have not done.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done and from the evil of what I have not done.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done and from the evil of what I have not done.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min sharri ma 'amiltu wa min sharri ma lam a'mal

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ زَيِّنَّا بِزِينَةِ الْإِيمَانِ، وَاجْعَلْنَا هُدَاةً مُهْتَدِينَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, beautify us with the beauty of faith, and make us guides who are rightly guided.

translations.ar: O Allah, beautify us with the beauty of faith, and make us guides who are rightly guided.
translations.en: O Allah, beautify us with the beauty of faith, and make us guides who are rightly guided.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma zayyinna bizeenatil-iman, waj'alna hudatan muhtadeen

duas.textAr: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
duas.textEn: In the name of Allah with whose name nothing on earth or in heaven can cause harm, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

translations.ar: In the name of Allah with whose name nothing on earth or in heaven can cause harm, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.
translations.en: In the name of Allah with whose name nothing on earth or in heaven can cause harm, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

duas.transliterationEn: Bismillahil-ladhi la yadurru ma'asmihi shay'un fil-ardi wa la fis-sama'i wa huwas-sami'ul-'alim

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْخُبْثِ وَالْخَبَائِثِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from evil male and female spirits.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from evil male and female spirits.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from evil male and female spirits.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-khubthi wal-khaba'ith

duas.textAr: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ، اللَّهُمَّ جَنِّبْنَا الشَّيْطَانَ، وَجَنِّبِ الشَّيْطَانَ مَا رَزَقْتَنَا
duas.textEn: In the name of Allah. O Allah, keep Satan away from us and keep Satan away from what You grant us.

translations.ar: In the name of Allah. O Allah, keep Satan away from us and keep Satan away from what You grant us.
translations.en: In the name of Allah. O Allah, keep Satan away from us and keep Satan away from what You grant us.

duas.transliterationEn: Bismillah. Allahumma jannibna-sh-shaytan, wa jannibish-shaytana ma razaqtana

duas.textAr: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَذْهَبَ عَنِّي الْأَذَى وَعَافَانِي
duas.textEn: All praise is due to Allah who removed harm from me and granted me health.

translations.ar: All praise is due to Allah who removed harm from me and granted me health.
translations.en: All praise is due to Allah who removed harm from me and granted me health.

duas.transliterationEn: Alhamdulillahil-ladhi adhhaba 'annil-adha wa 'afani

duas.textAr: بَارَكَ اللَّهُ لَكَ، وَبَارَكَ عَلَيْكَ، وَجَمَعَ بَيْنَكُمَا فِي خَيْرٍ
duas.textEn: May Allah bless you, and shower His blessings upon you, and bring you together in goodness.

translations.ar: May Allah bless you, and shower His blessings upon you, and bring you together in goodness.
translations.en: May Allah bless you, and shower His blessings upon you, and bring you together in goodness.

duas.transliterationEn: Barakallahu laka, wa baraka 'alayk, wa jama'a baynakuma fi khayr

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ كَمَا حَسَّنْتَ خَلْقِي فَحَسِّنْ خُلُقِي
duas.textEn: O Allah, as You have made my outward form beautiful, make my character beautiful too.

translations.ar: O Allah, as You have made my outward form beautiful, make my character beautiful too.
translations.en: O Allah, as You have made my outward form beautiful, make my character beautiful too.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma kama hassanta khalqi fa hassin khuluqi

duas.textAr: بِسْمِ اللهِ، وَاللهُ أَكْبَرُ، اللَّهُمَّ مِنْكَ وَلَكَ، اللَّهُمَّ تَقَبَّلْ مِنِّي
duas.textEn: In the name of Allah, Allah is the Greatest. O Allah, this is from You and for You. O Allah, accept from me.

translations.ar: In the name of Allah, Allah is the Greatest. O Allah, this is from You and for You. O Allah, accept from me.
translations.en: In the name of Allah, Allah is the Greatest. O Allah, this is from You and for You. O Allah, accept from me.

duas.transliterationEn: Bismillah, wallahu akbar. Allahumma minka wa lak, Allahumma taqabbal minni

duas.textAr: بِسْمِ اللهِ (ثَلَاثاً) أَعُوذُ بِاللهِ وَقُدْرَتِهِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا أَجِدُ وَأُحَاذِرُ (سَبْعاً)
duas.textEn: In the name of Allah (three times). I seek refuge in Allah and His power from the evil of what I find and I fear (seven times).
duas.titleAr: دعاء من أحس وجعاً في جسده

translations.ar: In the name of Allah (three times). I seek refuge in Allah and His power from the evil of what I find and I fear (seven times).
translations.en: In the name of Allah (three times). I seek refuge in Allah and His power from the evil of what I find and I fear (seven times).

duas.transliterationEn: Bismillah (thalathan). A'udhu billahi wa qudratihi min sharri ma ajidu wa uhadhiru (sab'an)

duas.textAr: بِسْمِ اللهِ
duas.textEn: In the name of Allah.

translations.ar: In the name of Allah.
translations.en: In the name of Allah.

duas.transliterationEn: Bismillah

duas.textAr: بِسْمِ اللهِ
duas.textEn: In the name of Allah.

translations.ar: In the name of Allah.
translations.en: In the name of Allah.

duas.transliterationEn: Bismillah

duas.textAr: أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَـهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، وَأَشْهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُولُهُ
duas.textEn: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, without any partner, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and His Messenger.

translations.ar: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, without any partner, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and His Messenger.
translations.en: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, without any partner, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and His Messenger.

duas.transliterationEn: Ashhadu an la ilaha illallahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, wa ashhadu anna Muhammadan 'abduhu wa rasuluh

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِي مِنَ التَّوَّابِينَ وَاجْعَلْنِي مِنَ الْمُتَطَهِّرِينَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, make me among those who turn to You in repentance, and make me among those who are purified.

translations.ar: O Allah, make me among those who turn to You in repentance, and make me among those who are purified.
translations.en: O Allah, make me among those who turn to You in repentance, and make me among those who are purified.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma-j'alni minat-tawwabeen waj'alni minal-mutatahhireen

duas.textAr: سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، أَسْتَغْفِرُكَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْكَ
duas.textEn: Glory is to You, O Allah, and praise is to You. I bear witness that there is no deity but You. I seek Your forgiveness and I repent to You.
duas.titleAr: الذكر بعد الوضوء مع رفع البصر
duas.titleEn: After Wudu Looking to the Sky

titleTranslations.en: After Wudu Looking to the Sky

translations.ar: Glory is to You, O Allah, and praise is to You. I bear witness that there is no deity but You. I seek Your forgiveness and I repent to You.
translations.en: Glory is to You, O Allah, and praise is to You. I bear witness that there is no deity but You. I seek Your forgiveness and I repent to You.

duas.transliterationEn: Subhanakallahumma wa bihamdik, ashhadu an la ilaha illa ant, astaghfiruka wa atubu ilayk

duas.textAr: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ
duas.textEn: There is no deity but Allah. (Encourage the dying person to say this.)

translations.ar: There is no deity but Allah. (Encourage the dying person to say this.)
translations.en: There is no deity but Allah. (Encourage the dying person to say this.)

duas.transliterationEn: La ilaha illallah

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَارْحَمْنِي وَأَلْحِقْنِي بِالرَّفِيقِ الْأَعْلَى
duas.textEn: O Allah, forgive me, have mercy on me, and join me with the highest companion (in Paradise).
duas.titleEn: Supplication at the Time of Death

titleTranslations.en: Supplication at the Time of Death

translations.ar: O Allah, forgive me, have mercy on me, and join me with the highest companion (in Paradise).
translations.en: O Allah, forgive me, have mercy on me, and join me with the highest companion (in Paradise).

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma-ghfir li warhamni wa alhiqni bir-rafeeqil-a'la

duas.textAr: إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُونَ، اللَّهُمَّ أْجُرْنِي فِي مُصِيبَتِي وَأَخْلِفْ لِي خَيْراً مِنْهَا
duas.textEn: To Allah we belong and to Him is our return. O Allah, reward me in my affliction and replace it with something better.

translations.ar: To Allah we belong and to Him is our return. O Allah, reward me in my affliction and replace it with something better.
translations.en: To Allah we belong and to Him is our return. O Allah, reward me in my affliction and replace it with something better.

duas.transliterationEn: Inna lillahi wa inna ilayhi raji'oon. Allahumma-jurni fi musibati wa akhlif li khayran minha

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِفُلَانٍ وَارْفَعْ دَرَجَتَهُ فِي الْمَهْدِيِّينَ، وَاخْلُفْهُ فِي عَقِبِهِ فِي الْغَابِرِينَ، وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا وَلَهُ يَا رَبَّ الْعَالَمِينَ، وَافْسَحْ لَهُ فِي قَبْرِهِ وَنَوِّرْ لَهُ فِيهِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, forgive (name) and raise his rank among the rightly guided, and be a successor to whom he has left behind. Forgive us and him, O Lord of the worlds. Make his grave spacious and illuminate it for him.
duas.titleEn: When Closing the Eyes of the Deceased

titleTranslations.en: When Closing the Eyes of the Deceased

translations.ar: O Allah, forgive (name) and raise his rank among the rightly guided, and be a successor to whom he has left behind. Forgive us and him, O Lord of the worlds. Make his grave spacious and illuminate it for him.
translations.en: O Allah, forgive (name) and raise his rank among the rightly guided, and be a successor to whom he has left behind. Forgive us and him, O Lord of the worlds. Make his grave spacious and illuminate it for him.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma-ghfir li-fulan warfa' darajatahu fil-mahdiyyeen, wakhlufhu fi 'aqibihi fil-ghabireen, waghfir lana wa lahu ya rabbal-'aalameen, wafsah lahu fi qabrihi wa nawwir lahu feeh

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِحَيِّنَا وَمَيِّتِنَا، وَشَاهِدِنَا وَغَائِبِنَا، وَصَغِيرِنَا وَكَبِيرِنَا، وَذَكَرِنَا وَأُنْثَانَا. اللَّهُمَّ مَنْ أَحْيَيْتَهُ مِنَّا فَأَحْيِهِ عَلَى الْإِسْلَامِ، وَمَنْ تَوَفَّيْتَهُ مِنَّا فَتَوَفَّهُ عَلَى الْإِيمَانِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, forgive our living and our dead, those who are present and those who are absent, our young and our old, our males and our females. O Allah, whomever among us You keep alive, let him live upon Islam, and whomever You cause to die, let him die upon faith.

translations.ar: O Allah, forgive our living and our dead, those who are present and those who are absent, our young and our old, our males and our females. O Allah, whomever among us You keep alive, let him live upon Islam, and whomever You cause to die, let him die upon faith.
translations.en: O Allah, forgive our living and our dead, those who are present and those who are absent, our young and our old, our males and our females. O Allah, whomever among us You keep alive, let him live upon Islam, and whomever You cause to die, let him die upon faith.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma-ghfir lihayyina wa mayyitina, wa shahidina wa gha'ibina, wa sagheerina wa kabeerina, wa dhakarina wa unthana. Allahumma man ahyaytahu minna fa ahyihi 'alal-Islam, wa man tawaffaytahu minna fa tawaffahu 'alal-iman

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لَهُ وَارْحَمْهُ، وَعَافِهِ وَاعْفُ عَنْهُ، وَأَكْرِمْ نُزُلَهُ، وَوَسِّعْ مُدْخَلَهُ، وَاغْسِلْهُ بِالْمَاءِ وَالثَّلْجِ وَالْبَرَدِ، وَنَقِّهِ مِنَ الْخَطَايَا كَمَا يُنَقَّى الثَّوْبُ الْأَبْيَضُ مِنَ الدَّنَسِ، وَأَبْدِلْهُ دَاراً خَيْراً مِنْ دَارِهِ، وَأَهْلاً خَيْراً مِنْ أَهْلِهِ، وَزَوْجاً خَيْراً مِنْ زَوْجِهِ، وَأَدْخِلْهُ الْجَنَّةَ، وَأَعِذْهُ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ وَعَذَابِ النَّارِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, forgive him and have mercy on him, grant him well-being and pardon him. Honor his reception and expand his entry. Wash him with water, snow, and ice. Cleanse him of sins as a white garment is cleansed of dirt. Replace his home with a better home, his family with a better family, his spouse with a better spouse. Admit him to Paradise and protect him from the punishment of the grave and the torment of the Fire.
