translations.ar: O Allah, forgive him and have mercy on him, grant him well-being and pardon him. Honor his reception and expand his entry. Wash him with water, snow, and ice. Cleanse him of sins as a white garment is cleansed of dirt. Replace his home with a better home, his family with a better family, his spouse with a better spouse. Admit him to Paradise and protect him from the punishment of the grave and the torment of the Fire.
translations.en: O Allah, forgive him and have mercy on him, grant him well-being and pardon him. Honor his reception and expand his entry. Wash him with water, snow, and ice. Cleanse him of sins as a white garment is cleansed of dirt. Replace his home with a better home, his family with a better family, his spouse with a better spouse. Admit him to Paradise and protect him from the punishment of the grave and the torment of the Fire.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma-ghfir lahu warhamhu, wa 'afihi wa'fu 'anhu, wa akrim nuzulahu, wa wassi' mudkhalahu, waghsilhu bilma'i wath-thalji walbarad, wa naqqihi minal-khataya kama yunaqqath-thawbul-abyadhu minad-danas, wa abdilhu daran khayran min darih, wa ahlan khayran min ahlih, wa zawjan khayran min zawjih, wa adkhilhul-jannah, wa a'idhhu min 'adhabil-qabri wa 'adhabin-nar

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْهُ فَرَطاً وَذُخْراً لِوَالِدَيْهِ، وَشَفِيعاً مُجَاباً. اللَّهُمَّ ثَقِّلْ بِهِ مَوَازِينَهُمَا، وَأَعْظِمْ بِهِ أُجُورَهُمَا، وَأَلْحِقْهُ بِصَالِحِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ، وَاجْعَلْهُ فِي كَفَالَةِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, make him a forerunner and a treasure for his parents, and an accepted intercessor. O Allah, make their scales heavy through him, increase their reward, join him with the righteous believers, and place him in the care of Ibrahim.

translations.ar: O Allah, make him a forerunner and a treasure for his parents, and an accepted intercessor. O Allah, make their scales heavy through him, increase their reward, join him with the righteous believers, and place him in the care of Ibrahim.
translations.en: O Allah, make him a forerunner and a treasure for his parents, and an accepted intercessor. O Allah, make their scales heavy through him, increase their reward, join him with the righteous believers, and place him in the care of Ibrahim.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma-j'alhu faratan wa dhukhran liwalidayh, wa shafee'an mujaba. Allahumma thaqqil bihi mawazeenahuma, wa a'zhim bihi ujoorahuma, wa alhiqhu bisalihi-l-mu'mineen, waj'alhu fi kafalati Ibrahim

duas.textAr: إِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَا أَخَذَ، وَلَهُ مَا أَعْطَى، وَكُلُّ شَيْءٍ عِنْدَهُ بِأَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى، فَلْتَصْبِرْ وَلْتَحْتَسِبْ
duas.textEn: Verily, to Allah belongs what He took, and to Him belongs what He gave. Everything with Him has an appointed time. So have patience and seek reward.

translations.ar: Verily, to Allah belongs what He took, and to Him belongs what He gave. Everything with Him has an appointed time. So have patience and seek reward.
translations.en: Verily, to Allah belongs what He took, and to Him belongs what He gave. Everything with Him has an appointed time. So have patience and seek reward.

duas.transliterationEn: Inna lillahi ma akhadh, wa lahu ma a'ta, wa kullu shay'in 'indahu bi ajalin musamma, faltasbir waltahtasib

duas.textAr: بِسْمِ اللهِ وَعَلَى سُنَّةِ رَسُولِ اللهِ
duas.textEn: In the name of Allah, and upon the Sunnah of the Messenger of Allah.

translations.ar: In the name of Allah, and upon the Sunnah of the Messenger of Allah.
translations.en: In the name of Allah, and upon the Sunnah of the Messenger of Allah.

duas.transliterationEn: Bismillahi wa 'ala sunnati rasulillah

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لَهُ، اللَّهُمَّ ثَبِّتْهُ
duas.textEn: O Allah, forgive him. O Allah, make him steadfast.

translations.ar: O Allah, forgive him. O Allah, make him steadfast.
translations.en: O Allah, forgive him. O Allah, make him steadfast.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma-ghfir lah, Allahumma thabbithu

duas.textAr: السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكُمْ أَهْلَ الدِّيَارِ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُسْلِمِينَ، وَإِنَّا إِنْ شَاءَ اللهُ بِكُمْ لَاحِقُونَ، نَسْأَلُ اللهَ لَنَا وَلَكُمُ الْعَافِيَةَ
duas.textEn: Peace be upon you, O inhabitants of the graves, from among the believers and Muslims. Indeed, by the will of Allah, we will join you. We ask Allah for well-being for us and for you.

translations.ar: Peace be upon you, O inhabitants of the graves, from among the believers and Muslims. Indeed, by the will of Allah, we will join you. We ask Allah for well-being for us and for you.
translations.en: Peace be upon you, O inhabitants of the graves, from among the believers and Muslims. Indeed, by the will of Allah, we will join you. We ask Allah for well-being for us and for you.

duas.transliterationEn: As-salamu 'alaykum ahlad-diyari minal-mu'mineena wal-muslimeen, wa inna in sha'Allahu bikum lahiqoon, nas'alullaha lana wa lakumul-'afiyah

duas.textAr: لَبَّيْكَ اللَّهُمَّ لَبَّيْكَ، لَبَّيْكَ لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ لَبَّيْكَ، إِنَّ الْحَمْدَ وَالنِّعْمَةَ لَكَ وَالْمُلْكَ، لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ
duas.textEn: Here I am, O Allah, here I am. Here I am, You have no partner, here I am. Verily all praise, grace, and sovereignty belong to You. You have no partner.

translations.ar: Here I am, O Allah, here I am. Here I am, You have no partner, here I am. Verily all praise, grace, and sovereignty belong to You. You have no partner.
translations.en: Here I am, O Allah, here I am. Here I am, You have no partner, here I am. Verily all praise, grace, and sovereignty belong to You. You have no partner.

duas.transliterationEn: Labbayk Allahumma labbayk, labbayka la shareeka laka labbayk, innal-hamda wan-ni'mata laka wal-mulk, la shareeka lak

duas.textAr: بِسْمِ اللهِ وَاللهُ أَكْبَرُ
duas.textEn: In the name of Allah, and Allah is the Greatest.

translations.ar: In the name of Allah, and Allah is the Greatest.
translations.en: In the name of Allah, and Allah is the Greatest.

duas.transliterationEn: Bismillahi wallahu akbar

duas.textAr: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
duas.textEn: Our Lord, give us in this world that which is good and in the Hereafter that which is good, and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.
duas.titleAr: الدعاء بين الركن اليماني والحجر الأسود
duas.titleEn: Between Yemeni Corner and Black Stone

titleTranslations.en: Between Yemeni Corner and Black Stone

translations.ar: Our Lord, give us in this world that which is good and in the Hereafter that which is good, and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.
translations.en: Our Lord, give us in this world that which is good and in the Hereafter that which is good, and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.

duas.transliterationEn: Rabbana atina fid-dunya hasanah, wa fil-akhirati hasanah, wa qina 'adhaban-nar

duas.textAr: إِنَّ الصَّفَا وَالْمَرْوَةَ مِنْ شَعَائِرِ اللهِ، أَبْدَأُ بِمَا بَدَأَ اللهُ بِهِ. لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَحْدَهُ، أَنْجَزَ وَعْدَهُ، وَنَصَرَ عَبْدَهُ، وَهَزَمَ الْأَحْزَابَ وَحْدَهُ
duas.textEn: Indeed, Safa and Marwah are among the symbols of Allah. I begin with what Allah began with. There is no deity but Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs the dominion and praise, and He is over all things Omnipotent. There is no deity but Allah alone. He fulfilled His promise, supported His servant, and defeated the confederates alone.

translations.ar: Indeed, Safa and Marwah are among the symbols of Allah. I begin with what Allah began with. There is no deity but Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs the dominion and praise, and He is over all things Omnipotent. There is no deity but Allah alone. He fulfilled His promise, supported His servant, and defeated the confederates alone.
translations.en: Indeed, Safa and Marwah are among the symbols of Allah. I begin with what Allah began with. There is no deity but Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs the dominion and praise, and He is over all things Omnipotent. There is no deity but Allah alone. He fulfilled His promise, supported His servant, and defeated the confederates alone.

duas.transliterationEn: Innas-Safa wal-Marwata min sha'a'irillah, abda'u bima bada'allahu bih. La ilaha illallahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadeer. La ilaha illallahu wahdah, anjaza wa'dah, wa nasara 'abdah, wa hazamal-ahzaba wahdah

duas.textAr: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
duas.textEn: There is no deity but Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He is over all things Omnipotent.
duas.titleEn: Supplication of the Day of Arafah

titleTranslations.en: Supplication of the Day of Arafah

translations.ar: There is no deity but Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He is over all things Omnipotent.
translations.en: There is no deity but Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He is over all things Omnipotent.

duas.transliterationEn: La ilaha illallahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadeer

duas.textAr: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَاللهُ أَكْبَرُ
duas.textEn: There is no deity but Allah, and Allah is the Greatest. (Recite Takbir and Tahlil at Muzdalifah and make abundant du'a.)

translations.ar: There is no deity but Allah, and Allah is the Greatest. (Recite Takbir and Tahlil at Muzdalifah and make abundant du'a.)
translations.en: There is no deity but Allah, and Allah is the Greatest. (Recite Takbir and Tahlil at Muzdalifah and make abundant du'a.)

duas.transliterationEn: La ilaha illallahu wallahu akbar

duas.textAr: اللهُ أَكْبَرُ
duas.textEn: Allah is the Greatest. (Said with each pebble thrown at the Jamarat.)

translations.ar: Allah is the Greatest. (Said with each pebble thrown at the Jamarat.)
translations.en: Allah is the Greatest. (Said with each pebble thrown at the Jamarat.)

duas.transliterationEn: Allahu Akbar

duas.textAr: سُبْحَانَ اللهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَلَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَاللهُ أَكْبَرُ وَلَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللهِ
duas.textEn: Glory be to Allah, all praise is for Allah, there is no deity but Allah, Allah is the Greatest, and there is no power or might except with Allah.

translations.ar: Glory be to Allah, all praise is for Allah, there is no deity but Allah, Allah is the Greatest, and there is no power or might except with Allah.
translations.en: Glory be to Allah, all praise is for Allah, there is no deity but Allah, Allah is the Greatest, and there is no power or might except with Allah.

duas.transliterationEn: SubhanAllah, walhamdu lillah, wa la ilaha illallah, wallahu akbar, wa la hawla wa la quwwata illa billah

duas.textAr: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ
duas.textEn: All praise is due to Allah. (The one who sneezes says this, and others reply: 'Yarhamukallah' - May Allah have mercy on you, and the sneezer responds: 'Yahdikumullahu wa yuslihu balakum' - May Allah guide you and rectify your condition.)

translations.ar: All praise is due to Allah. (The one who sneezes says this, and others reply: 'Yarhamukallah' - May Allah have mercy on you, and the sneezer responds: 'Yahdikumullahu wa yuslihu balakum' - May Allah guide you and rectify your condition.)
translations.en: All praise is due to Allah. (The one who sneezes says this, and others reply: 'Yarhamukallah' - May Allah have mercy on you, and the sneezer responds: 'Yahdikumullahu wa yuslihu balakum' - May Allah guide you and rectify your condition.)

duas.transliterationEn: Alhamdulillah

duas.textAr: يَرْحَمُكَ اللهُ
duas.textEn: May Allah have mercy on you. (Said to someone who sneezes and praises Allah.)

translations.ar: May Allah have mercy on you. (Said to someone who sneezes and praises Allah.)
translations.en: May Allah have mercy on you. (Said to someone who sneezes and praises Allah.)

duas.transliterationEn: Yarhamukallah

duas.textAr: يَهْدِيكُمُ اللهُ وَيُصْلِحُ بَالَكُمْ
duas.textEn: May Allah guide you and rectify your condition.

translations.ar: May Allah guide you and rectify your condition.
translations.en: May Allah guide you and rectify your condition.

duas.transliterationEn: Yahdikumullahu wa yuslihu balakum

duas.textAr: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي عَافَانِي مِمَّا ابْتَلَاكَ بِهِ وَفَضَّلَنِي عَلَى كَثِيرٍ مِمَّنْ خَلَقَ تَفْضِيلاً
duas.textEn: All praise is for Allah Who has spared me of what He has tested you with and has preferred me over many of His creation.

translations.ar: All praise is for Allah Who has spared me of what He has tested you with and has preferred me over many of His creation.
translations.en: All praise is for Allah Who has spared me of what He has tested you with and has preferred me over many of His creation.

duas.transliterationEn: Alhamdulillahil-ladhi 'afani mimmabtilaka bihi wa faddalani 'ala katheerin mimman khalaqa tafdeela

duas.textAr: سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، أَسْتَغْفِرُكَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْكَ
duas.textEn: Glory is to You, O Allah, and praise is to You. I bear witness that there is no deity but You. I seek Your forgiveness and repent to You.

translations.ar: Glory is to You, O Allah, and praise is to You. I bear witness that there is no deity but You. I seek Your forgiveness and repent to You.
translations.en: Glory is to You, O Allah, and praise is to You. I bear witness that there is no deity but You. I seek Your forgiveness and repent to You.

duas.transliterationEn: Subhanakallahumma wa bihamdik, ashhadu an la ilaha illa ant, astaghfiruka wa atubu ilayk

duas.textAr: جَزَاكَ اللهُ خَيْراً
duas.textEn: May Allah reward you with good.
duas.titleEn: For One Who Does You a Favor

titleTranslations.en: For One Who Does You a Favor

translations.ar: May Allah reward you with good.
translations.en: May Allah reward you with good.

duas.transliterationEn: Jazakallahu khayran

duas.textAr: أَحَبَّكَ الَّذِي أَحْبَبْتَنِي لَهُ
duas.textEn: May He for whose sake you love me, love you too.
duas.titleAr: الدعاء لمن قال أحبك في الله
duas.titleEn: To One Who Says I Love You for Allah

titleTranslations.en: To One Who Says I Love You for Allah

translations.ar: May He for whose sake you love me, love you too.
translations.en: May He for whose sake you love me, love you too.

duas.transliterationEn: Ahabbakal-ladhi ahbabtani lah

duas.textAr: وَفِيكَ بَارَكَ اللهُ
duas.textEn: And may Allah bless you too.
duas.titleAr: الدعاء لمن قال بارك الله فيك

translations.ar: And may Allah bless you too.
translations.en: And may Allah bless you too.

duas.transliterationEn: Wa feeka barakallah

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ أَنْ أُشْرِكَ بِكَ وَأَنَا أَعْلَمُ، وَأَسْتَغْفِرُكَ لِمَا لَا أَعْلَمُ
duas.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from knowingly associating partners with You, and I seek Your forgiveness for what I do not know.

translations.ar: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from knowingly associating partners with You, and I seek Your forgiveness for what I do not know.
translations.en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from knowingly associating partners with You, and I seek Your forgiveness for what I do not know.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika an ushrika bika wa ana a'lam, wa astaghfiruka lima la a'lam

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ لَا طَيْرَ إِلَّا طَيْرُكَ، وَلَا خَيْرَ إِلَّا خَيْرُكَ، وَلَا إِلَهَ غَيْرُكَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, there is no omen but Your omen, and there is no good but Your good, and there is no deity other than You.

translations.ar: O Allah, there is no omen but Your omen, and there is no good but Your good, and there is no deity other than You.
translations.en: O Allah, there is no omen but Your omen, and there is no good but Your good, and there is no deity other than You.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma la tayra illa tayruk, wa la khayra illa khayruk, wa la ilaha ghayruk

duas.textAr: اسْأَلُوا اللهَ مِنْ فَضْلِهِ
duas.textEn: Ask Allah for His bounty. (When you hear a rooster crow, it has seen an angel.)

translations.ar: Ask Allah for His bounty. (When you hear a rooster crow, it has seen an angel.)
translations.en: Ask Allah for His bounty. (When you hear a rooster crow, it has seen an angel.)

duas.transliterationEn: Is'alullaha min fadlih

duas.textAr: أَعُوذُ بِاللهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ
duas.textEn: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed devil. (When you hear dogs barking at night, seek refuge in Allah, for they see what you do not see.)
duas.titleEn: Upon Hearing Dogs Bark at Night

titleTranslations.en: Upon Hearing Dogs Bark at Night

translations.ar: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed devil. (When you hear dogs barking at night, seek refuge in Allah, for they see what you do not see.)
translations.en: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed devil. (When you hear dogs barking at night, seek refuge in Allah, for they see what you do not see.)

duas.transliterationEn: A'udhu billahi minash-shaytanir-rajeem

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ فَأَيُّمَا مُؤْمِنٍ سَبَبْتُهُ فَاجْعَلْ ذَلِكَ لَهُ قُرْبَةً إِلَيْكَ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ
duas.textEn: O Allah, whichever believer I have insulted, make that a means of closeness to You for him on the Day of Resurrection.

translations.ar: O Allah, whichever believer I have insulted, make that a means of closeness to You for him on the Day of Resurrection.
translations.en: O Allah, whichever believer I have insulted, make that a means of closeness to You for him on the Day of Resurrection.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma fa ayyuma mu'minin sababtuhu faj'al dhalika lahu qurbatan ilayka yawmal-qiyamah

duas.textAr: مَنْ حَفِظَ عَشْرَ آيَاتٍ مِنْ أَوَّلِ سُورَةِ الْكَهْفِ عُصِمَ مِنَ الدَّجَّالِ
duas.textEn: Whoever memorizes the first ten verses of Surah Al-Kahf will be protected from the Dajjal. (Recite the first 10 verses of Surah Al-Kahf.)

translations.ar: Whoever memorizes the first ten verses of Surah Al-Kahf will be protected from the Dajjal. (Recite the first 10 verses of Surah Al-Kahf.)
translations.en: Whoever memorizes the first ten verses of Surah Al-Kahf will be protected from the Dajjal. (Recite the first 10 verses of Surah Al-Kahf.)

duas.transliterationEn: Man hafiza 'ashra ayatin min awwali suratil-kahf 'usima minad-Dajjal

duas.textAr: مَا شَاءَ اللهُ لَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللهِ
duas.textEn: What Allah wills, there is no power except with Allah. (Say this to avoid afflicting with the evil eye.)

translations.ar: What Allah wills, there is no power except with Allah. (Say this to avoid afflicting with the evil eye.)
translations.en: What Allah wills, there is no power except with Allah. (Say this to avoid afflicting with the evil eye.)

duas.transliterationEn: Ma sha'Allahu la quwwata illa billah

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّا نَجْعَلُكَ فِي نُحُورِهِمْ وَنَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شُرُورِهِمْ
duas.textEn: O Allah, we place You before them and we seek refuge in You from their evil.

translations.ar: O Allah, we place You before them and we seek refuge in You from their evil.
translations.en: O Allah, we place You before them and we seek refuge in You from their evil.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma inna naj'aluka fi nuhoorihim wa na'udhu bika min shuroorihim

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ السَّمَاوَاتِ السَّبْعِ وَرَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ، كُنْ لِي جَاراً مِنْ فُلَانِ بْنِ فُلَانٍ وَأَحْزَابِهِ مِنْ خَلَائِقِكَ، أَنْ يَفْرُطَ عَلَيَّ أَحَدٌ مِنْهُمْ أَوْ يَطْغَى، عَزَّ جَارُكَ، وَجَلَّ ثَنَاؤُكَ، وَلَا إِلَهَ غَيْرُكَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, Lord of the seven heavens and Lord of the Magnificent Throne, be my protector from so-and-so and his allies from among Your creation, lest any of them hasten to wrong me or tyrannize me. Mighty is Your protectorate, exalted is Your praise, and there is no deity but You.

translations.ar: O Allah, Lord of the seven heavens and Lord of the Magnificent Throne, be my protector from so-and-so and his allies from among Your creation, lest any of them hasten to wrong me or tyrannize me. Mighty is Your protectorate, exalted is Your praise, and there is no deity but You.
translations.en: O Allah, Lord of the seven heavens and Lord of the Magnificent Throne, be my protector from so-and-so and his allies from among Your creation, lest any of them hasten to wrong me or tyrannize me. Mighty is Your protectorate, exalted is Your praise, and there is no deity but You.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma rabbas-samawatis-sab'i wa rabbal-'arshil-'azeem, kun li jaran min fulanibni fulan wa ahzabihi min khala'iqik, an yafruta 'alayya ahadun minhum aw yatgha, 'azza jaruk, wa jalla thana'uk, wa la ilaha ghayruk

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ مُنْزِلَ الْكِتَابِ، سَرِيعَ الْحِسَابِ، اهْزِمِ الْأَحْزَابَ، اللَّهُمَّ اهْزِمْهُمْ وَزَلْزِلْهُمْ
duas.textEn: O Allah, Revealer of the Book, Swift in reckoning, defeat the confederates. O Allah, defeat them and shake them.

translations.ar: O Allah, Revealer of the Book, Swift in reckoning, defeat the confederates. O Allah, defeat them and shake them.
translations.en: O Allah, Revealer of the Book, Swift in reckoning, defeat the confederates. O Allah, defeat them and shake them.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma munzilal-kitab, saree'al-hisab, ihzimil-ahzab. Allahummah-zimhum wa zalzilhum

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اكْفِنِيهِمْ بِمَا شِئْتَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, suffice me against them however You wish.

translations.ar: O Allah, suffice me against them however You wish.
translations.en: O Allah, suffice me against them however You wish.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahummak-fineehim bima shi't

duas.textAr: حَسْبُنَا اللهُ وَنِعْمَ الْوَكِيلُ
duas.textEn: Allah is sufficient for us and He is the best disposer of affairs.

translations.ar: Allah is sufficient for us and He is the best disposer of affairs.
translations.en: Allah is sufficient for us and He is the best disposer of affairs.

duas.transliterationEn: Hasbunallahu wa ni'mal-wakeel

duas.textAr: آمَنْتُ بِاللهِ وَرُسُلِهِ
duas.textEn: I believe in Allah and His Messengers. (If Satan whispers to you about the creation of Allah, say this and seek refuge in Allah.)

translations.ar: I believe in Allah and His Messengers. (If Satan whispers to you about the creation of Allah, say this and seek refuge in Allah.)
translations.en: I believe in Allah and His Messengers. (If Satan whispers to you about the creation of Allah, say this and seek refuge in Allah.)

duas.transliterationEn: Amantu billahi wa rusulihi

duas.textAr: أَعُوذُ بِاللهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ
duas.textEn: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed devil.

translations.ar: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed devil.
translations.en: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed devil.

duas.transliterationEn: A'udhu billahi minash-shaytanir-rajeem

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ اكْفِنِي بِحَلَالِكَ عَنْ حَرَامِكَ، وَأَغْنِنِي بِفَضْلِكَ عَمَّنْ سِوَاكَ
duas.textEn: O Allah, suffice me with what is lawful against what is unlawful, and enrich me by Your bounty against need of anyone besides You.

translations.ar: O Allah, suffice me with what is lawful against what is unlawful, and enrich me by Your bounty against need of anyone besides You.
translations.en: O Allah, suffice me with what is lawful against what is unlawful, and enrich me by Your bounty against need of anyone besides You.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahummak-fini bihalalika 'an haramik, wa aghnini bifadlika 'amman siwak

duas.textAr: أَعُوذُ بِاللهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ، وَاتْفُلْ عَنْ يَسَارِكَ ثَلَاثاً
duas.textEn: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed devil. (Then spit dryly to your left three times.)

translations.ar: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed devil. (Then spit dryly to your left three times.)
translations.en: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed devil. (Then spit dryly to your left three times.)

duas.transliterationEn: A'udhu billahi minash-shaytanir-rajeem, watful 'an yasarika thalathan

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ لَا سَهْلَ إِلَّا مَا جَعَلْتَهُ سَهْلاً، وَأَنْتَ تَجْعَلُ الْحَزْنَ إِذَا شِئْتَ سَهْلاً
duas.textEn: O Allah, nothing is easy except what You make easy, and You make the difficult easy if You wish.

translations.ar: O Allah, nothing is easy except what You make easy, and You make the difficult easy if You wish.
translations.en: O Allah, nothing is easy except what You make easy, and You make the difficult easy if You wish.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma la sahla illa ma ja'altahu sahla, wa anta taj'alul-hazna idha shi'ta sahla

duas.textAr: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللهَ الَّذِي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْهِ
duas.textEn: I seek forgiveness from Allah, the One whom there is no deity but He, the Ever-Living, the Self-Subsisting, and I repent to Him.

translations.ar: I seek forgiveness from Allah, the One whom there is no deity but He, the Ever-Living, the Self-Subsisting, and I repent to Him.
translations.en: I seek forgiveness from Allah, the One whom there is no deity but He, the Ever-Living, the Self-Subsisting, and I repent to Him.

duas.transliterationEn: Astaghfirullahall-ladhi la ilaha illa huwal-hayyul-qayyumu wa atubu ilayh

duas.textAr: أَعُوذُ بِاللهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ. بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمَنِ الرَّحِيمِ: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ، مَلِكِ النَّاسِ، إِلَهِ النَّاسِ، مِنْ شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ
duas.textEn: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed devil. In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful: Say, I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind, the Sovereign of mankind, the God of mankind, from the evil of the retreating whisperer.
duas.titleEn: Expelling the Devil and His Whispers

titleTranslations.en: Expelling the Devil and His Whispers

translations.ar: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed devil. In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful: Say, I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind, the Sovereign of mankind, the God of mankind, from the evil of the retreating whisperer.
translations.en: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed devil. In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful: Say, I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind, the Sovereign of mankind, the God of mankind, from the evil of the retreating whisperer.

duas.transliterationEn: A'udhu billahi minash-shaytanir-rajeem. Bismillahir-rahmanir-raheem: Qul a'udhu birabbin-nas, malikin-nas, ilahin-nas, min sharril-waswasil-khannas

duas.textAr: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللهِ التَّامَّةِ مِنْ غَضَبِهِ وَعِقَابِهِ وَشَرِّ عِبَادِهِ، وَمِنْ هَمَزَاتِ الشَّيَاطِينِ وَأَنْ يَحْضُرُونِ
duas.textEn: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from His anger, His punishment, the evil of His servants, and from the prodding of the devils and that they be present.

translations.ar: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from His anger, His punishment, the evil of His servants, and from the prodding of the devils and that they be present.
translations.en: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from His anger, His punishment, the evil of His servants, and from the prodding of the devils and that they be present.

duas.transliterationEn: A'udhu bikalimati-llahit-tammati min ghadabihi wa 'iqabihi wa sharri 'ibadihi, wa min hamazatish-shayateeni wa an yahdurun

duas.textAr: ذَهَبَ الظَّمَأُ وَابْتَلَّتِ الْعُرُوقُ وَثَبَتَ الْأَجْرُ إِنْ شَاءَ اللهُ
duas.textEn: The thirst has gone, the veins have been moistened, and the reward is confirmed, if Allah wills.

translations.ar: The thirst has gone, the veins have been moistened, and the reward is confirmed, if Allah wills.
translations.en: The thirst has gone, the veins have been moistened, and the reward is confirmed, if Allah wills.

duas.transliterationEn: Dhahabaz-zama'u wab-tallat-il-'urooqu wa thabatal-ajru in sha Allah

duas.textAr: نَوَيْتُ صَوْمَ غَدٍ مِنْ شَهْرِ رَمَضَانَ
duas.textEn: I intend to fast tomorrow in the month of Ramadan. (The intention is in the heart, and verbalizing it is for learning purposes.)

translations.ar: I intend to fast tomorrow in the month of Ramadan. (The intention is in the heart, and verbalizing it is for learning purposes.)
translations.en: I intend to fast tomorrow in the month of Ramadan. (The intention is in the heart, and verbalizing it is for learning purposes.)

duas.transliterationEn: Nawaytu sawma ghadin min shahri Ramadan

duas.textAr: ذَهَبَ الظَّمَأُ وَابْتَلَّتِ الْعُرُوقُ وَثَبَتَ الْأَجْرُ إِنْ شَاءَ اللهُ
duas.textEn: The thirst has gone, the veins are moistened, and the reward is confirmed, if Allah wills.

translations.ar: The thirst has gone, the veins are moistened, and the reward is confirmed, if Allah wills.
translations.en: The thirst has gone, the veins are moistened, and the reward is confirmed, if Allah wills.

duas.transliterationEn: Dhahabadh-dhama'u wabtallat-il-'urooqu wa thabatal-ajru in sha'Allah

duas.textAr: أَفْطَرَ عِنْدَكُمُ الصَّائِمُونَ، وَأَكَلَ طَعَامَكُمُ الْأَبْرَارُ، وَصَلَّتْ عَلَيْكُمُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ
duas.textEn: May the fasting people break their fast at your place, and may the righteous eat your food, and may the angels send blessings upon you.

translations.ar: May the fasting people break their fast at your place, and may the righteous eat your food, and may the angels send blessings upon you.
translations.en: May the fasting people break their fast at your place, and may the righteous eat your food, and may the angels send blessings upon you.

duas.transliterationEn: Aftara 'indakumus-sa'imoon, wa akala ta'amakumul-abrar, wa sallat 'alaykumul-mala'ikah

duas.textAr: إِنِّي صَائِمٌ، إِنِّي صَائِمٌ
duas.textEn: I am fasting, I am fasting. (If someone fights or insults you while fasting, say this.)
duas.titleAr: ما يقول الصائم إذا سابه أحد

translations.ar: I am fasting, I am fasting. (If someone fights or insults you while fasting, say this.)
translations.en: I am fasting, I am fasting. (If someone fights or insults you while fasting, say this.)

duas.transliterationEn: Inni sa'im, inni sa'im

duas.textAr: صَلَّتْ عَلَيْكُمُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ
duas.textEn: May the angels send blessings upon you. (Pray for the host if you are fasting and decline to eat.)
duas.titleAr: الصائم إذا حضر الطعام ولم يفطر
duas.titleEn: When Food Is Presented But Not Breaking Fast

titleTranslations.en: When Food Is Presented But Not Breaking Fast

translations.ar: May the angels send blessings upon you. (Pray for the host if you are fasting and decline to eat.)
translations.en: May the angels send blessings upon you. (Pray for the host if you are fasting and decline to eat.)

duas.transliterationEn: Sallat 'alaykumul-mala'ikah

duas.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّكَ عَفُوٌّ تُحِبُّ الْعَفْوَ فَاعْفُ عَنِّي
duas.textEn: O Allah, You are Pardoning and You love to pardon, so pardon me.

translations.ar: O Allah, You are Pardoning and You love to pardon, so pardon me.
translations.en: O Allah, You are Pardoning and You love to pardon, so pardon me.

duas.transliterationEn: Allahumma innaka 'afuwwun tuhibbul-'afwa fa'fu 'anni
